name: Onenellemoo
description: This is an action-adventure game that requires you to use your brain. Save the world with your powers of observation and inspiration!

name: Lovux
description: Lovux is a minimalist puzzle game where you try to break all glasses on the screen using different types of glass wisely.

name: Ravva and the Phantom Library
description: Escape the Phantom Library! Embark into worlds of fantastic books haunted by dangerous ghosts, but you're not alone! Join Ravva and 4 unusual companions in this pixel-art platformer in cute dark-fantasy visuals! Can you face this challenge?

name: Drag the Dead
description: A mind virus has taken hold of the population! Assume the role of drag-queen--zombie-slayer extraordinaire Zane Dmaaj and battle your way through mobs of NPZees, Fatties, SoiBois and more in the high octane, pearl clutching shooter Drag the Dead!

name: Alight in the Dark
description: Alight in the Dark is a reverse bullet hell survival game where players use abilities and equipment to survive. Unlock characters and upgrade base stats as you play, in a world where humanity has split light into five main elements, with a mysterious sixth. Make strategic decisions to survive.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails into Reverie - Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition includes the Base Game, Digital Soundtrack and Mini Art Book.

name: Jello
description: Jello is a physics-based platformer where you jump as a cute slime using just the two sticks of your controller

name: Irrational
description: The emotional story of a woman with anxiety.

name: Octane Remix
description:
Octane Remix is a Singleplayer Obstacle Hell Racing Game focused on Customization and Replayability.
Octane Remix offers the racing fan everything they could want! Everything from unique characters, each with their own playstyle, to a distinct artstyle.
Remix your levels and compete against the clock, or with other players in a race to decide out who is the better driver!

In its recently released alpha state, Octane Remix only features a single player mode, with multiplayer expected to be released by the time the beta rolls out!

name: Full Quiet
description: A totally new 8-Bit experience of survival, puzzles and exploration unlike anything you've played before.

name: Hexa Sort
description:
Hexa Sort offers a delightful blend of puzzle challenges, strategic matching, and satisfying merging experience. Engage your mind with stimulating brain games that involve clever puzzle solving and logical maneuvers, making it an ideal choice for those seeking a mental workout.

Hexa Sort introduces a unique twist to the classic sort puzzle concept, inviting players to explore the art of shuffling and organizing hexagon tile stacks. With the goal of achieving satisfying color matches, players can immerse themselves in the thrill of color switch and enjoy the calming effects of merging tiles. Each level presents challenges to meet collection goals, providing a perfect balance of excitement and stress relief for those who prefer relaxing games.

The game's aesthetics boast a visually pleasing palette with gradients, creating a serene and zen environment for players to enjoy. Dive into the world of color games, color sorting, and free therapy through the game's minimalistic design. The inclusion of 3D graphics adds an extra layer of immersion, allowing players to view the board from various angles while engaging in the satisfying processes of stacking and merging tiles.

Hexa Sort is not merely a game; it's a captivating brain teaser that demands smart thinking. As players progress through levels, they'll find the gameplay to be both addicting and calming, striking the perfect balance between challenge and relaxation. Put your skills to the test with tasks involving sorting, stacking, and merging hexa tiles, witnessing the rewarding results of your efforts.

Unlock new levels to keep your mind sharp, reveling in the therapeutic experience of this captivating color puzzle game. The game caters to enthusiasts of color fill 3D and challenges based on hexagon structures. Invite friends to join the excitement, compete for high scores, and share the joy of engaging in fun puzzle games.

name: Kodokuhime
description:
Himiko's been a wallflower her whole life- so plain and quiet that even the spirits around her never take an interest. But a chance encounter on her way to school might just be the thing to thrust her into the forefront of her very own story.

With black-and-white styling and comic-inspired presentation, Kodukuhime aims to emulate the feeling of a classic shonen manga- full of humor, action, and drama. Framed as the "first chapter" of what would go on to be a weekly series, it can be played through in a single 20-30 minute session.

name: Sachova Hra
description: Find out what lies behind the seemingly banal chess game. Close your eyes and travel across memory and time in the footsteps of an almost forgotten human destiny in the interactive radio drama The Chess Game.

name: My RV Skills
description: Sin descripción

name: Pizza Ready!
description:
Introducing Pizza Ready, the ultimate pizza restaurant simulation game!
Are you ready to become the master of your own pizza empire? This pizzeria game will immerse you in the world of a pizza shop and teach you everything about running a pizza business, from cooking and serving to cleaning and even managing staff!

Run your own Pizza Restaurant!
As the boss of a pizza restaurant, you'll be responsible for everything from making and serving pizzas to managing store and hiring

name: Angry King
description:
Take on the role of Leonard and explore the king's castle preparing the wittiest pranks while avoiding capture by the king and his guards.

Discover a new way to play the Keplerians universe. Solve puzzles to prank the Angry King and enjoy the results of your pranks.

name: The One
description:
The One' came about when they sought to create a game that focused on a narrative, seeking to keep the player absorbed in the story and exploration of the world.

The main concept from which this idea was born was a simple pen. From this came the mechanics, which mostly revolve around using the feathers, and the main theme, angels and their wings.

Due to the scope of the project, it will be separated into two iterations. The initial idea is the realisation of the first iteration for the delivery of the TFM, while the second iteration will remain in a conceptual form that can be realised from the first iteration.

The first iteration includes the entire 3D open world that the player will explore in search of the elements that will give him access to the story and improve his skills. The second iteration will transform the upgrade items into "portals" that will transport the player to 2D arcade-like levels with side-scrolling platforming, where they will have to progress through different obstacles in order to get that upgrade item.

name: Red Red Tarmac: XL Deluxe
description:
The sky is the wrong colour. Go on a road trip with your weird friend to explore an abandoned pizza joint.

A short, vaguely apocalyptic, queer slice of life visual novel.

name: Sailor Fuku to Femme Fatale
description:
That's it. I'm your femme fatale.
The woman who will become your absolutely destined partner and lead you to your end.
That's me. And that's you.
You will be guided by me towards a gentle and pacific destruction.

name: Raver's Rumble
description: Sin descripción

name: Dum-Dum Thoughts
description:
Sometimes thoughts are too loud
This is a set of 6 vent-y speedmaps that was made in 4 days. Mostly they're focused on atmosphere, so spending a bit of time on the map while listening to midi after killing the monsters will be worth it

name: Megatris: Arcade Edition
description: A mod of the Uzebox port of Tetris, made for the RetroAchievements community.

name: The Ultimate Doom: In Name Only
description: The project was designed to be a creative exercise in building levels around the original map titles for all 36 maps of the Ultimate Doom with an increasing emphasis on creating challenging but enjoyable maps that will even given experienced veterans a stern test (Especially for an Ultimate Doom megawad and especially so for episodes 3 and 4). All maps are built to a limit removing (complevel 3) format and are beatable from a pistol start, difficulty setting are included, but some may need a little refinement to pitch the difficulty with more precision. Co-op starts are included but anything beyond this will be patchy and dependent on the author who made the map.

name: Saints Row: Doc Ketchum's Murder Circus
description: The dark carnival has returned to Boot Hill! Play as one of four contestants in a challenging new solo battle of skill, perseverance and brutality.

name: Color Together
description: Activity selected co-op coloring game apart inside of Discord's Nitro program. Grab some friends and let the chill music soothe your soul as you paint some color into the world.

name: Disrepair
description: Disrepair is a atmospheric horror mod that focuses around a lone combine hazmat worker. They have been dispatched to the radioactive ruins of Black Mesa to photograph visual evidence of the anomalies located in the faclity's office complex. Can they make it out unharmed?

name: Royal Romances: The Power of Chosen One - Collector's Edition
description: The important thing in life is to be able to let go of the past and always be open to an uncharted future. Could you embrace your destiny and save the kingdom?

name: Russpuppy Kid Books
description: Your child will explore interactive stories, enjoy engaging reading games, and even bring their own book to life. Foster creativity, vocabulary, and a love for learning. Encourage the budding reader and writer in your young one. Experience the thrill of learning!

name: News Reacts: Mission Impossible 2
description: Four more News Reacts missions.

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Faroe Islands XP
description: Up high in the Northern Atlantic Ocean, between Iceland, Norway, and Great Britain, lie the Faroe Islands - an archipelago of 18 islands. Here, helicopters are important for traffic in areas that buses and ferries do not reach, while visitors from abroad arrive at Vágar Airport.

name: Side View Golf
description: A golf game that you can enjoy, like playing a puzzle. That's "Side View Golf".

name: Arcade Archives: Pole Position
description:
"POLE POSITION" is a racing game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1982.
The game is divided into qualifying and grand prix. If you make a lap in the qualifying round with a good time, you will advance to the grand prix.
Use your driving technique to win the POLE POSITION!

name: Mechanic 8230: Escape From Ilgrot - Ultimate Edition
description: Mechanic 8230: Escape from Ilgrot is a puzzle point & click adventure, set in the ruined city of Ilgrot. Use anything you can find to progress through the story.

name: WorldNeverland: Daily Life in the Elnea Kingdom - Pioneer Summer Outfit Set: Citrus
description:
Comes with:
- Pioneer Summer Outfit: Citrus "Refreshingly cool summer wear often seen around the Nak Peninsula's southern frontier."
- Summer Pioneer Kid's Wear: Cit "Refreshingly cool kid's summer wear often seen around the Nak Peninsula's southern frontier."

name: Royal Romances: The Power of Chosen One DLC
description: Explore additional locations and achieve new goals! Travel to a wonderful world of magic and learn more about its inhabitants!

name: A Dark Room
description: Critically acclaimed, minimalist text-based rpg. Come light the fire.

name: 1 Date Danger
description: It's your first semester at the prestigious Lombardi University, and you've immediately dived head first into the chaos of organizing the student-run New Year festival. You immediately befriend Trait, a kind but slightly disturbed rabbit, and his best friend Stoney, a perma-stoned dog who keeps up a strong emotional guard around new people. What will you do to win their hearts?

name: Sniper Elite 5: Kraken Awakes - Mission, Weapon and Skin Pack
description:
The final content drop for Season Pass Two delivers an incredible new mission called Kraken Awakes that brings the story of Sniper Elite 5 to a close. Shocking new Intel suggests that Project Kraken is still very much alive, and parts are being shipped to a military dock. It’s now down to you to put an end to Kraken once and for all.
Based around an advanced aircraft carrier that is currently under construction, Karl will have to infiltrate the carrier under the cover of darkness, to stop its deployment as well as putting an end to Friedrich Vogel, who is now spearheading the project.

name: Mahjong Woods
description: Beautiful and relaxing nature inspired mahjong game!

name: Paint Ball
description: A fun platformer with a lot of wall slides, traps, skill and rage quits

name: House Flipper: Pets Bundle
description: Experience House Flipper with addition of Pet Companions!

name: House Flipper: Mega Pack
description: Discover Endless Garden Possibilities and Find Your Perfect Pet Companions in this version of the game with all available DLCs!

name: Family Jigsaw Puzzle: Classic Mosaic Puzzles
description: A classic mind puzzle in which you have to completely fill the playing field with shapes of different shapes.

name: Railed Up
description: A shooter inside tramways on suspended railways viewed from below, set in a dystopian future.

name: Sex Simulator: Beach Resort
description: An interactive sex simulation game featuring visual novel elements, high definition images and videos, and realistic-looking characters set in a beautiful decor. You play as a guy who takes three different women on vacations to a luxury beach resort.

name: Sentimental Death Loop
description: Just as you begin to settle in for a fun day at your best friend's house, something changes in her and she kills you. And not just once—she ends your life time and time and time again. Your goal is to escape from this endless loop of despair.

name: Mountain Climb Driver
description: Break into extreme racing - go through a high-speed hill climb, complete the race and become the "King of the Hill"!

name: RichMan 4 Fun
description: In the world of property, rely on your luck and decision-making becoming a tycoon!

name: ItsJustAStory
description: ItsJustAStory is a solo post-apocalyptic game, it's a story about a doctor and a build-up to the production of the actual game. your goal is to stay alive and find the cure, you play through a series of events with tasks simple to complete. the main focus here is to get the story.

name: Banana Man: The Space Monkeys
description: In a world full of Ape Men, you are a Banana Man struggling to survive in a space station. Build platforms, catch bananas and restore the space station to become the commander.

name: Rumple Town
description: Rumple Town is a card drafting game, that involves defending a town that is populated by beans. Recruit beans to protect your town, and attacks the invading monsters. Can you and your town survive?

name: Mojo Melee
description: Mojo Melee is a strategic auto chess battler game where strategy and tactics reign supreme. Assemble unique teams of Mojos, Champions, and SpellStones, and battle it out in engaging PvP matches.

name: Gimmick! Special Edition
description:
Gimmick! Special Edition is a Port of the NES classic Gimmick! to modern consoles.

Gimmick! Special Edition includes brand new bonus features such as achievements, time attack mode, save, load, and rewind functions, a gallery mode, and more.

name: Blue Oak Bridge
description: Blue Oak Bridge features breathtaking 2D hand-painted art in a storybook world of powerful witches, ancient magic and royal secrets. Farm, forage and fish throughout the island of Eloria and use all you discover to brew potions, make produce and help your new friends.

name: Alterium Shift
description: Join three heroes in training as they learn to master their individual strengths and harness the power of Alterium Essence. With their training nearly completed, Dolion, their teacher, prepares them for the most important mission they've faced yet.

name: Can Shot
description:
Can Shot is a spin on the game Tin Can Alley where you throw sandbags at cans.

With the levels Funfair, Jolly Forest and Downtown, you can test your throwing skills as you rapidly throw balls at the airborne cans, fruit, bombs and mystery boxes to rack up points!

With more cans appearing as you play, seize the opportunity to hit bombs that trigger explosions and obliterate multiple cans at once for combo points! Also be on the lookout for mystery boxes that contains bonus points, extra time and bonus cans, with a small chance to hit the jackpot for all 3!

name: Dark Card
description: A game about exploration and experimentation

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Super Mario Leaders Pack
description: A mod that adds 3 unique Mario themed civilizations (Mushroom Kingdom, Koopas and Sarasaland) with 3 unique leaders (Peach, Bowser and Daisy). Leaders are fully 3D animated with their own custom background music, and unique visuals from both units and governors. If Hero Mode is enabled, 2 new heroes are also available: Mario & Luigi.

name: Portals: Escape the Infinity
description: A transcendent point-and-click puzzle adventure. Can you escape 50 Portals?

name: Genshin Impact: Secret Summer Paradise
description:
Version 3.8 of Genshin Impact, which included:
• New outfits for Kaeya and Klee
• New limited-time area: Veluriyam Mirage
• New hangout events for Kaeya
• New main event: Secret Summer Paradise
• …and more!

name: Logic Island
description: Logic Island a logic puzzle game for the original Game Boy. It's inspired by an existing game from a famous Japanese magazine publisher called Nurikabe.

name: Radar N Rockets
description: Think you can handle air radar and a rocket launcher at once? Take down as many enemies as possible.

name: Don’t Let It Out
description:
There’s something in your bathroom. No matter what you do, don’t let it out.

Don't Let It Out is a short horror game that takes about 10-30 minutes. It is connected another game "From the Sun to the Moon" but it isn't necessary to play that one first to enjoy this one. The main character is nonbinary and uses they/them pronouns.

name: Boreal Tenebrae: Deluxe Premium Edition
description: Boreal Tenebrae will take you on a retro-style adventure, with a mysterious atmosphere and horror elements. The game is inspired by 90s classics and the best TV series.

name: Adolf Hitler RPG: Last Minutes of the Millennium Empire
description: Adolf Hitler RPG: Last Minutes of the Millennium Empire is a simple and short game where you get to put an end to the man who initiated World War II.

name: Boat Trip
description: Drive a boat to earn coins and buy a new better boats. Live longer to earn bigger score.

name: Andara: Rise for Rebellion
description: Ordon's armies have invaded Hailstone and are plundering their resources. Become Andara, the tyrant's daughter, in this frenetic third-person shooter. Engage enemy weak points and move fast in a brief yet intense single-player campaign. Rise for rebellion.

name: Idle Champions: Mythic Freely Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Freely (if you don't already own them) Mythic Freely Skin An Epic Feat for Freely 7 Gold Freely Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Lofi Ball: Dessert
description: This DLC contains 2 skins (Donut) (Wreath), and 10 new levels (Dessert)

name: Good Pizza, Great Pizza: Summer Slices Set - Summer 2023
description: Bite into a slice of summer with these!

name: Hi-Fi Rush: Traditional Garb Costume Pack
description: Fit out the Hi-Fi RUSH gang with looks inspired by the past with the Traditional Garb Costume Pack! Rockstars don't always wear ripped jeans, you know.

name: Celeste Mario's Zap & Dash!
description: A hastily done minihack (with levels designed within 2 months) that features Celeste-styled gameplay.

name: Virtual WarZone
description:
Pilot a Next Generation Tank with 3-D HUD!

You are a tank commander remote piloting a future generation tank in the year 2179. Unknown enemy forces have attacked and turned your country into a WarZone! Using a red laser based heads-up display (HUD), your tank gives you see-through armor capabilities, while allowing you to pilot from a remote fortified location. Your objective is to stay alive and hunt down enemy AI powered sentry towers, tanks, and helicopters.

You navigate your tank using your onboard radar and compass. Two primary weapons are at your fingertips: a machine gun and a BFG. Use your machine gun wisely or it overheats. Your BFG packs a bigger punch but takes time to reload. Aim carefully and always be on the lookout for enemies that are constantly hunting you!

Good luck commander.

name: Go Up!
description: In this technical first-person platformer, the objective is to get to the top in the shortest time, when you fall you may lose significant progress and feel negative emotions, this is normal.

name: Barbarossa Remake
description: A Fantasy Top Down level based game that features around a little mage that has special abilities

name: Let's Play! Oink Games: Make the Difference
description: Don't let your dreams be dreams. You CAN make a difference! A board game where you make a "Spot the Difference".

name: Fishgun
description: Fishgun is a chaotic fish-person shooter where you feed your sentient gun random upgrades to defeat hordes of evil fruit.

name: Shire Scopes
description: A multiplayer arena shooter with sniper-muskets, swords, and fluid movement mechanics. Climb the leaderboards!

name: Trouble Witches Final! Episode 01: Daughters of Amalgam
description: Sin descripción

name: Mencia: A Never Was Tale
description: Mencia: A Never Was Tale., is a styled rogue-like, 2D platform, in which you will have to face agains an invasion of cute aliens using the properties a magic sword will give you. Let's go!

name: Quantum Derelict
description: Quantum Derelict is a rogue-lite survival horror game set in a chilling Lovecraftian inspired narrative. In the uncharted vastness of space, outwit the sinister cult of VUGSHERYOG and the lurking horrors as you strive to retain your sanity, find rescue, and survive against all odds.

name: 3D Puzzle: Battle Royal
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: Hentai Fantasy Chicks
description: Hentai Fantasy Chicks is a casual puzzle game. Listen to the relaxing music, move around the fragments of the image, and make the full picture. Explore and enjoy all different types of fantasy girls and relax.

name: Mars Survivors
description: Ready to tackle the challenge? On Mars, confront countless mutated creatures and mechanical monsters. Choose survivors, weapons, and skills wisely for diverse battles. Employ precise shooting, agile dodging, and strategic use of props and skills to fend off enemy attacks.

name: Machi: Above the Void
description: Is a captivating voxel-style indie puzzle game set in Japan style. Immerse yourself in its mesmerizing atmosphere, solve puzzles, and enjoy relaxing Asian-inspired music. Compete in multiplayer, climb leaderboards, and unlock achievements. A captivating journey of tranquillity and challenge awaits.

name: 3D Puzzle: Desert Wind
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.

name: Hi-Fi Rush: Arcade Challenge
description: This Hi-Fi Rush Arcade Challenge Update adds two new challenge modes to the game. The two new modes are BPM Rush and Power Up Tower Up, each with their own challenges and rewards to unlock.

name: Clash Cards
description: A card battling game for the Playdate

name: Dyg
description: Labor in the field.

name: Cranky Bird
description: A flappy adventure with a cranky bird for Playdate.

name: Mash Gadget
description: Mash like a master on your Playdate!

name: Plague Breaker
description: Plague Breaker is a retro rogue-lite platformer with heavy RPG elements. Pick your class, create unique characters by multiclassing or create your own class with the class creator, all while exploring a procedurally generated castle filled with undead monsters and corrupted plague doctors.

name: Original
description:
"Original" is an action puzzle game that tests operation

O is a robot specially born to explore the secret realm, it is invincible.
You will control O to go to a rare and uninhabited secret realm, control the direction and distance of O during the adventure, travel through the secret realm to find treasures and bring them back to the transmitter.
During the adventure, you will face various ancient organs, difficult terrain, and magical creatures. Use your reaction and wisdom to solve various difficulties along the way!

name: Cal & Bomba
description: Join the pyromaniac gnome Cal and the troll Bomba on an explosive math adventure, in this award winning game. They travel through different worlds with their cannon. You must use percentage calculations to change the range of the cannon.

name: Wrangler
description: A turn-based sex RPG.

name: Zeppelin Armada
description:
Zeppelin Armada is a new steampunk-themed megawad for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards, lead by 40oz.

There's two versions here for download - a "full" version with Steampunk weapons, skins & sounds and a "clean" version with just the maps and the classic Doom weapons.

name: Oddy's Lost and Found
description:
Do you remember why Oddy hired you?
Explore the unknown world, seek oddjects that await to be found.

A Dream Diary Jam 7 entry.

name: Pump It Up Phoenix
description: Pump it Up Phoenix 2023 arcade dance machine offers the most updated dance machine yet, with over 150 K-pop, original and new music. The PIU series also offers new steps and scoring changes.

name: Everlune
description: A platforming game that takes place on the Moon, where the player goes through the mysterious red portals back and forth between parallel worlds to solve the puzzles and find collectibles.

name: Jitsuroku Powerful Yakyuuken: Slugger Yamada
description: Sin descripción

name: Fastest on the Buzzer
description: Sin descripción

name: Pinging
description: Pinging, is a solo simulation bouncing ball on a paddle, suits all ages

name: Covid 23: Test Labs
description: Infiltrate hazardous facilities, plant explosives, gather vital evidence, and save survivors while battling against nightmarish mutations. Brace yourself for an intense and action-packed mission to overcome the unexpected horrors that await.

name: Bounty Drag Racing: Pro Mod Pack 1
description: This Pro Mod Pack includes (2) Pro Modified type vehicles, with big tires and wheelie bars, and (2) Radial 315 versions of these vehicles with no Wheelie bars. The Pro Mods are the fastest door cars and include engine swaps for domestic engines.

name: Bounty Drag Racing: Pro Mod Pack 2
description: This Pro Mod Pack includes (2) Pro Modified type vehicles, with big tires and wheelie bars, and (2) Radial 315 versions of these vehicles with no Wheelie bars. The Pro Mods are the fastest door cars and include engine swaps for domestic engines.

name: Reaper's Isle
description: The ancient island beckons in this open-world, stealth horror game. Search for your missing daughter while avoiding dangerous phantom creatures. Restore power across the island to access the lab in the island's depths where you'll discover the fate of your missing daughter.

name: Knights of Braveland: Around the World Pack
description: Around the World Pack offers you a whole bunch of in-game items from all over the world. Most of the new equipment will be available in the first locations, so you will encounter interesting combinations from the very beginning.

name: StarOS
description: Tired of only seeing text on your personal computer? Get ready to make the leap to the graphic dimension with this new OS, the future is now!

name: The Interview
description: A very sexy story with plenty of lewd scenes and animations.

name: Next Station: Zombies
description: "Next Station: Zombies" is an indie-casual game that throws you into a post-apocalyptic world infested with hordes of ravenous zombies.

name: Hidden Village Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Ducks Can Drive
description: Ducks like to race, even in their own cars! Earn money by delivering food to fellow ducks in the city, then use this money to upgrade your vehicle. The better the vehicle, the better chance you have to win the race at the end of the day!

name: American Hero Unrated
description: Sin descripción

name: Nyanpaya
description:
It's a 3-match puzzle game that can be played by up to 8 people!

If you align 3 or more pieces with the same pattern, the pieces will disappear and you will get points!

Score up by erasing while disappearing! Aim for a high score and erase them within the time limit!

name: Power Vacuum
description: Power Vacuum is a fast-paced, competitive strategy game. It aims for minimalism, stripping away all the unnecessary detail to let you play as fast as you can. Power Vacuum features a “play against your past self” system that automatically records the games you (and your friends!) play.

name: Survivor Warrior-Vampire.io
description:
Shaklas Continent is a magical world full of fantasy!
Awakened by a magical curse, you must embark on a difficult road to explore the world.
Grab your weapons, cast your spells, and join other survivors to defeat powerful enemies!
Upgrade equipment and talents to expand your own advantages and create your secret recipe for victory
Wandering in survival and exploration, uncover the mysteries of each story.

name: Planting Trees
description: Take on the role of a reforestation expert.

name: Synapse
description: Combine brutal and tactile firepower with surging telekinetic abilities as you dive into a hostile mindscape. Harness this lethal combination and master your own combat style as you dive deeper into a surreal world. Launch, levitate, and smash your enemies through destructible environments using motion controls and eye tracking-assisted aiming.

name: Axial Disc 2
description: The long awaited sequel to Axial Disc 1!

name: Deck of Life
description: No turns, individual card permadeath. Construct defenses while launching projectiles to destroy your opponent's cards. Beat enemies and events to win cards from unique card pools. If all your cards are destroyed, you die.

name: Icorp
description: Build, equip, manage and sell! Those are the four cornerstones of this tycoon game. Build factories, setup production processes, buy and upgrade machinery, and take order over everything related to large company operations. Produce anything from wooden cutlery to modern electronics to rockets!

name: Brawl Stars: Enchanted Woods
description: Sin descripción

name: Turnabout Retribution
description:
The road to hell is paved with good intentions...

Kristoph Gavin is willing to go to hell and back in order to get his revenge on Phoenix Wright.

Even if it means making a deal to get it...

Even if it means getting entangled in the most diabolical court case he's ever seen...

But even then, will he succeed?

name: Phantom of the Twilight
description: Enjoy a sweet romance with vampires in this otome novel adventure.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2 Infinity
description: A total conversion mod for Sonic Robo Blast 2 that changes its gameplay to resemble that of Phantasy Star Portable 2 Infinity.

name: Matar Gente Rica de Skate
description: Matar Gente Rica de Skate is a simple and short roguelike, all you have to do is kill the ten* billionaires on your list to reach zero, each stage is randomized in its enemies, instruments that will play in the background, and the seven powerups that you can pick up.

name: FolcDark
description: FolcDark is a prologue of a third-person dark fantasy action-adventure game, with a story and characters focused on Brazilian folklore.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Pibby Corrupted Kitchen Gun
description: Friday Night Funkin': Pibby Corrupted Kitchen Gun is a mod for Friday Night Funkin' based around the Kitchen Gun skit from The Peter Serafinowicz Show mixed in the corruption concept from Come and Learn with Pibby!. The mod showcases a theoretical situation where Derek Bum becomes corrupted and has to sing against Boyfriend.

name: Hauntred Factory Skibidi Poppy Freedy
description: Hauntred Factory Skibidi Poppy Freedy is a thrilling horror game that will test your courage and skills. Explore the dark and mysterious factory, where you will face terrifying creatures and deadly traps. Complete scary missions and unlock characters like Freedy Skibidi, Toilet and Huggy Wuggy. Can you survive the nightmare and escape the factory?

name: Mario In Mushroom Rix Land 4: Trip To Nano Island
description: A very difficult hack for SMW with 50 exits

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Bark, Bone and Blood
description: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary weapons, and one Legendary tool: Iron Bark (Hunter), Bonecutter (Caldwell Rival 78), Hunter's Guide (LeMat Revolver), and Traitor's Tooth (Knuckle Knife).

name: Untitled Star Fox Minihack 2
description:
Sequel to Sunlit’s Untitled Star Fox Minihack.

One route, 6 Stages, mostly planets. I can’t speak for the difficulty, but if you can beat the original Star Fox, this shouldn’t be terrible. Also lots of added-in dialogue. It was fun to write that stuff.

name: My Forced Yakuza Fiancée
description: One day, you come to the aid of a distressed girl cornered by menacing criminals… However, little do you know, the stranger you saved is none other than Miyabi Kenzaki, the boss of a notorious yakuza clan!

name: Rec: Beyond The Lens
description: Rec: Beyond The Lens is a first-person horror game that tells the story of an unresolved past, with realistic graphics. Explore an unknown location, investigating dark secrets while using a body camera to document every step

name: Luminous Skies: A Short Adventure
description: A free-to-play turn based RPG. Explore the world and fight challenging battles. Play fun mini games. Gather food and cook it.

name: Luminous Skies: A Short Adventure DLC
description: Adds a few more missions. More characters to select for the party. More classes available for Briar.

name: Sixtar Gate: Startrail - Pocotone Pack
description: Meet the collaboration pack between 「Sixtar Gate: STARTRAIL」 and AfreecaTV's virtual BJ crew 'POKOTONE'! This DLC includes a total of 10 new songs and 9 new emotes.

name: Luminous Skies: The Pilgrimage
description: Standalone Expansion Uncover the story across a wider world. Fight challenging battles. Play fun mini games. Gather food and cook it. Harder Difficulty: greater challenges and new story elements.

name: Pain: Repainted
description: Remember your deepest fear and shame? You get PAIN... the DLC! PAIN: Below Sanity is back, like never seen before, meaning now you can awkwardly steer your ship and feel pure rage with new graphics and many more!

name: Fox Run
description: Improve your reflexes and gain more experience in your skills to avoid obstacles in your way

name: The Sand Table War: Cruciata
description: Be sure to become the King of the Kingdom of Jerusalem!

name: Settler's Odyssey
description: Sandbox and roguelike where you can create your own unique settlement! Protect it from enemies, explore the open world and write your own odyssey.

name: Home Run Derby: vs Fairy Tales
description:
Intense VR Home Run Derby Game Begins Here!
The pitchers you'll face are famous characters from fairy tales. They'll throw absurd and unpredictable magic pitches. Stay in the ultimate state of concentration, the "Zone," and hit home runs with precision!

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Sports Spectacle
description: 1 Brand New Table with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Sports themed table with 2 upper playfields.

name: Future Offline
description: Future Offline is an Oldschool single player RPG. It simulates a MMORPG and many mechanics are based around a MMO design. This game may primarily appeal to those looking for nostalgia of old MMOs or RPGs from the early 2000s or before.

name: Furni-Jumpin'
description: Watch out for those furniture! Furni-Jumpin' is a 2D platformer arcade game where you take control of a weird little creature dodging enemies and collecting items while jumping on furniture.

name: Light Speed Ride Out
description: Light Speed Ride Out is a top-down space survivors arena shooter with roguelite elements. Upgrade your ship with a variety of items to create unique builds and survive the enemy hordes. Assemble the crew of your ship, make the right decisions and rescue people to get them to join your space colony.

name: Lidar Survival
description: LIDAR Survival is a first person, survival horror game. Where you have to survive through multiple levels to escape the enemies in the darkness. Try find your way to the exit before they find you..

name: Party Party Time + Premium Pack Set
description: Party hearty with the Party Fever Pack, Party Harder Pack, Party Even Harder Pack, and Excitement Pack downloadable content bundle for Party Party Time! Let's party till we drop!

name: Melody Mania
description: Let your talent shine when you sing along your favorite songs in this fun party game! A variety of modes let you play with friends or compete against them. An open song format and integrated editor provide boundless possibilites.

name: Stickman and the Sword of Legends
description: Stickman needs to get the Sword of Legends to be able to leave his planet that is about to explode.

name: Slime-ing
description: In 'Sliming, players must navigate the slime through numerous obstacles to reach its destination by bouncing it. The control of avoiding obstacles such as spikes, saw blades, and moving platforms creates a thrilling experience for players.

name: Cease To Breathe
description: Cease to Breathe is retro-inspired adventure heavily influenced by the Commodore Amiga games of the late 1980's / early 90's.

name: Rise of the Funkys
description: A side scrolling beat 'em up game where you control 4 characters with unique combat mechanics. Make your way through 6 stages of this crime-ridden world, where random events happen to spice up the combat experience.

name: Ettrian: The Elf Prince
description: Unravel the truth behind betrayal and reclaim your rightful place in Ettrian - The Elf Prince, an epic adventure of survival and redemption!

name: AAA Clock 2: Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Dream Catcher
description: Find over 70 unique monsters to battle, collect and raise. Your monsters will go through a branching path of evolutions to help you explore a dream-like open world. Let your dreams become a reality or look for a way out.

name: Square Word: Summer Edition
description: Square Word is coming on Steam for PC, Mac & Linux! Find all the 100+ words spread in 10 sunny categories! Complete objectives & collect post cards!

name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Escape From Pripyat
description: A tactical, combat focused modpack, inspired by extraction game Escape From Tarkov.

name: Skibidi Toilet
description: Fight against the Skibidi Toilets. Try and survive all 5 nights.

name: Kamiji
description: Kamiji is a Japanese-learning AR trading card game that finds magic in the mundane! Following a volcanic eruption the creatures known as Kami were propelled out of the earth. They were lost and had no homes... But fortunately the ancient humans of China and Japan had hoped and anticipated that they would come home. And forged their entire writing system of the image of the Kami, knowing that one day they would have domains to return to. So the Kami finding these shrine-like remembrances of themselves buried themselves within the kanji. They might've gone completely unnoticed had it not been for a team of scientists who developed a new technology in the form of an app, called Kamiji. Players can use it to scan kanji characters on outdoor billboards that were covered in volcanic ash of the eruption to capture and tame the Kami living within each kanji character.

name: Knee-deep in 2023
description: Classic E1 replacement

name: Uanamon: Rugly Invasion
description: In the basement during the shelling, Sofia creates a character named Dracolyk who protects the imaginary World of Uanamon’s from the monsters country of rugly. As more children from different parts of Ukraine draw their own characters, the confrontation against the enemies grows stronger.

name: Amare Inversus
description: Amare Inversus is a psychological thriller about a surgeon deeply obsessed with her patient. Love, lust, and obsession will begin to blur, leaving the audience with an unforgettable visual novel.

name: Bombshell Barista: Speed Dating
description: Bombshell Barista: Speed Dating ---This is an adult, size kink-themed dating sim for the Bombshell Barista series!

name: Funny Park
description: Escape from HugoBoB using the Raygun on the toy factory! If you can!

name: Fever
description:
Max is a teenager, who got sick of fever.
He's having weird dreams because of that.
Find the 11 effects and leave your room.

A Yume Nikki fangame developed for Dream Diary Jam 7.

name: Savvy Four
description:
Savvy Four is a free to play, strategic board game for everyone. The goal is to connect four tokens to score points.

The game can be played in a web browser and is available as an app for iOS on the App Store and Android on Google Play.

To begin, players can customize their character and select a game type to play against either AI opponents of varying difficulties or a friend. Players have the option to participate in single games or join a league where each player competes against one another. The game features a ranking system that starts at Novice and progresses as players win games.

name: Kalikan
description: Kalikan is a vertically scrolling bullet hell 'shmup inspired by Dodonpachi- pushing the limits of ~virtual~ hardware . Control one of 3 1 ship(s) featuring two varied attack modes . Maintain your chain to compete for the highest scores.

name: Pinfall
description: A tower climbing challenge taking influence from classic game romhacks- 32 screens of tightly packed high-stakes precision platforming, where any fall could result in a devastating domino effect that erases your progress.

name: Ninnin
description: "Fifty City," where ordinary people and ninjas live together. However, the city is in turmoil due to ruthless "hunter" gangs. Ninja girl "Ninnin" infiltrates a gang to save the city!!

name: Confronting
description: Confronting is a science fiction micro horror puzzle game produced for RPG Maker MV, with a small amount of real-time combat.

name: Secret Summoner
description: A young fledgling hero sets out on a journey to teach misbehaving monsters a lesson. But little does he know his own mother tags along to support the youngster from the shadows in this action puzzle game!

name: Puckdoku
description:
The original hockey doku game.

Choose a player in the designated cell, ensuring they match the specified row and column criteria. Players have 9 guesses to complete the square in full. New games are available every day.

name: Match the Monsters!
description: Find and match three in a row of Monster High items and characters.

name: Hailey's Aesop
description:
Some time, in some country, in some town, there are hundreds if not thousands of people going about their lives, happy and content with who they are. Unfortunately, you are not as lucky.

To whom it concerns, you've described yourself as a homosexual purely out of simplicity. But you know for a fact that it's not that simple. You can't explain it, but there has to be a name for it...

...right?

name: Cheree: Remembering My Murder
description: Cheree doesn't know how she died. Nor does she know why she doesn't know. By "traveling" to dozens of different locations and chatting with her about any topic that comes to mind, Cheree will gradually remember details, and the two of you will discover clues that lead to the answers she has been seeking for over 100 years.

name: Goodnight
description: A Twine story where you go to bed. Except your thoughts prevent you from sleeping.

name: Ame no Tokyo Eki
description:
Only once in my life did I truly fall in love I still remember when it rains The smell of rain, the noise of people, the sound of announcements It's just a few days of love.

Navigate a Tokyo train station as you search after a mysterious woman.

name: MILF Next Door 2: Hijabi Mama
description: A game about helping your next-door neighbor, who happens to be a hot milf from another country.​

name: Ludus: Merge Arena
description: Welcome to Ludus! Fight fast-paced battles, defend your army in real time in PvP with other players! Enjoy the unique gameplay of this merging game! Build a deck of heroes, make it a tower of your strength, defend your squad, win battles, beat armies from around the planet, be the strongest PvP player!

name: Yart
description: A single simple techbase map.

name: Pony Arcadia
description:
Several pony kingdoms compete for territory, but never battle each other - they live in peace after all.

However, each player also controls an evil villain that will happily cause trouble...

name: Super Mario Maker for Nspire
description: An unofficial Super Mario Maker port for the TI-nSpire calculator.

name: Build a City Block
description: Build a City Block is an addictive blocks game where you need to fill city districts to reveal the landscape. Collect stars to raise unique landmarks. Increase your score and complete each levels.

name: Hollow Knight: Pale Court
description:
The unofficial expansion mod is finally here!
Challenge Hallownest's mightiest champions in grand combat!
Overcome your opponents with powerful new charms!
Discover new secrets and stories!
All with an incredible new soundtrack!

name: Bó Cócó Zinha
description: On a quiet planet full of ranches, a little chicken must take over the family restaurant and recover the golden recipes, which have been stolen and scattered across several worlds full of juicy enemies and spicy dangers. Face the challenges and regain the hopes of the Galo family.

name: Dirty Room: Chapter 6
description: You fainted after defeating the fat guy and can't recall what happened. The place just looks ancient ......

name: CatxBlock
description: Cute browser-based board strategy game for 2 or 4 players. Grab more land than your rivals. Change cute cat skins and hats, use magic, play on different maps and modes. Don't forget that CATmentator is watching you!

name: Risen Dead
description:
Risen Dead is an Eerie Zombie PSX Styled Action Survival Singleplayer game where a nuclear winter occurred, causing the dead to awake.

You are a survivor.

name: Flower Flurry
description: In this sweet and challenging 2D platformer, collect flowers as fast as you can while avoiding bees, wasps and spikes in a series of 40 randomly generated levels.

name: Bruxa
description: Candy world, book world, fantasy world...

name: Forgotten War
description: A "historical" strategy on the theme of wars of different times and peoples with funny characters and nice graphics. The game has a campaign with 16 levels and a sandbox.A "historical" strategy on the theme of wars of different times and peoples with funny characters and physics.

name: Vanitas
description: Conversations about being online, in 495 words.

name: Hello Counsel
description: Hello Counsel is a short, romantic comedy visual novel that follows criminal sensation, Poise, who just got arrested! Good thing, her hot lawyer boyfriend Salem is here to help her avoid any jail time — only if she stops flirting with him, that is.

name: Konon: Zew Choroszczy
description: A game about Konon, his arch-enemies, his missing friend, parcels with God's surprises and out-of-date ones (with peasant or children's inserts). Go in search of your nitro friend, fight your opponents, collect collectibles and unleash a mighty bang!

name: Tactical Warfare Bundle
description: This bundle contains FRONT MISSION 1st: Remake & FRONT MISSION 2: Remake

name: Schoolnight, 3am
description: Your online friend comes to you for help. And you have to talk them down.

name: Just Two
description: A murder mystery where some ladies go ghost hunting till someone ends up dead

name: XShuriken
description: Shuriken is somehow inspired by Pac-man and Pengo.

name: Sword of Justice
description: Sword of Justice is an Open world game, famous for its exquisite and delicate picture quality, real and vivid Jianghu atmosphere, subversion of traditional MMO techniques, and intelligent Al's profound impact on the game world. It is known as the "breathing Jianghu".

name: DavBot
description: Jump, Move & Dash! in DAVBOT, You are Escaping the Paragon City. Collect Coins & Destroy Other Enemies to Win! But... The Boss Won't Let You Escape without a fight.

name: Rolling for Romance
description: Rolling for Romance is a Slice-of-Life dating sim where you find companionship through the magical world of Dungeons and Dragons! Go through your first year of college as you make friends, bond with your fellow club members, and potentially roll your way into one of their hearts!

name: Knights & Guns: Armor Pack #2
description: Let your knight shine on the battlefield with Knights and Guns' "Armor Pack #2". This DLC offers two majestic armors, epitomizing grandeur and strength. Make a move, show courage, and astound your enemies!

name: Knights & Guns: Armor Pack #1
description: Brace yourself for "Armor Pack #1" for Knights and Guns. Stand tall against your adversaries with two robust armors, expertly crafted to endure the toughest battles. Transform your knight into an indestructible guardian of justice with this stellar upgrade!

name: Master Detective Archives: Rain Code - Season Pass
description:
The Season Pass for Master Detective Archives: Rain Code includes four DLC substories following different Master Detectives with their own unique skill.

The DLCs feature Desuhiko, Fubuki and Halara with a 4th detective not yet announced.

name: Jrago The Demon Hunter
description: Jrago The Demon Hunter is a METROIDVANIA style 2D Platforming Action-Adventure Role Playing Game. The world is overcome in darkness, and you are a hunter named Jrago on a quest to slay the demons and bring back the light!

name: Mouse Wants Cheese
description: 30+ levels packed with cheese, what more could a mouse want?

name: Fairytale Thief: The Goldfish
description:
One fine morning a lavish palace appears out of thin air.

Not unheard of in a magical world, but still a curious event.

Rumours travel fast, and they say the fabled wish-granting golden fish is being held prisoner inside its own creation.

Sounds like a job for a phantom thief!

name: Assignment Due: Project Blue
description:
Made for Otome Jam 2023.

A week-long online project being partnered with the quiet boy in your class that spirals into something different. Career dreams and the color blue, you wouldn’t have guessed an online class you were forced to take for your second year of college would lead you right to anything. Let alone to someone.

name: Between: Stardust Trail
description:
Made for Otome Jam 2023.

Clickety-clack... Clickety-clack…

Along the sound of the train track, Estelle, the MC, wakes up. After realizing that the information on her ticket was missing, Estelle had no choice but to work as a train attendant?! Will she be able to get off the train eventually?

name: Knights & Guns: Deluxe Edition
description:
Knights & Guns: Deluxe Edition is a digital bundle that contains the base game and Armor Pack #1 which adds 2 robust armors, expertly crafted to endure the toughest battles.

Knights & Guns brings you to a dangerous world where you will fight, alongside your friend, against demons, ghouls & ghosts. Use shotguns, lasers and the power of chivalry to overcome every obstacle. Become the best version of a knight - one with a gun.

name: Dogotchi: Virtual Pet - Deluxe Edition
description: Set off on a journey of nurturing and attending to your digital companion in Dogotchi: Virtual Pet. These charming dogs depicted in satisfying pixel art are bound to steal your heart!

name: Smash Remix: Version 1.4.0
description:
The fourth update to Smash Remix adds Goemon from the Mystical Ninja/Goemon franchise to the roster, along with new stages and features.

Two new playable characters from the Star Fox series were added: Slippy Toad and Peppy Hare.

name: Pearlglow Cafe: Sweet Crumb Kisses
description:
"With every wave, a new adventure..."

Near the edges of a seaside town, where salty breezes kiss skin and a radiant sun shines on the horizon, an enchanting cafe emerges... Owned and operated by an spirited young witch, every pastry she serves has a singular purpose: to spread boundless joy and compassion throughout the world.

Enter the world of Pearlglow Cafe and guide Juniper as she embarks on a charming journey filled with new beginnings, gentle romances, and delectably magical treats!

name: Curtain Call Crusade
description:
Mira, a college third year transfers to a new university to pursue her passion for theater acting, eager to make a name for herself. But she has a secret: She's a magical girl that fights evil! And it seems she's not the only one when a cocky outgoing hero appears in front of her one night, and things don't end well. Meanwhile in her regular life there’s a boy in theater class that she can't seem to get along with, but he seems to be hiding something.

Engage in competitive flirty banter, create mishaps and hijinks, and uncover secrets in this funny romantic comedy otome game!

name: The Last Hope: Dead Zone Survival
description:
The Last Hope: Dead Zone Survival is an intense storyline game set in an apocalyptic world overrun by hordes of ravenous zombies. As the main character, your sole objective is to survive and find a way to escape the nightmarish chaos that surrounds you.

To endure the challenges ahead, you must undertake daring missions that test your survival skills. Each mission you take can be the difference between life and death.

name: Rifter
description: A unique platformer puzzle where you have to duplicate yourself to solve the puzzles and progress without your other self catching up with you!

name: Globs & Ghosts
description:
Save the globules colony from the deadly ghosts. You drive a nano-robot whose aim is to crunch the ghosts and their power ups, while sparing the globules.
Served by beautiful graphics, sounds and animation, this arcade game introduce a new type of gameplay that will bring you hours of fun!

name: Aliens Attack
description: Aliens Attack is an arcade shooter that lets the user defend cities from an alien armada. Collect powerful weapons to destroy the invading ships in the sky. Survive the alien assault and save the world!

name: Sweet No Death
description: Sweet No Death is a short horror-themed RPG game. This game is dialogue-heavy and plays out more like a visual novel with light RPG elements.

name: Karamu
description: Two weeks ago, Nelli sent her long-term boyfriend, Raku, the following text: "I'm breaking up with you." She has been successfully avoiding him ever since...until her bike chain breaks. He helps her, but now she's trapped in a forest with only her broken bike, a cellphone with no reception, and her slightly creepy ex-boyfriend for company. He wants to talk, and one thing is clear: he really doesn't want to break up. (He probably won't take no for an answer.)

name: Doom & Destiny Worlds: Ultimate Supporter Edition
description:
Unlock everything ever made for Doom & Destiny Worlds!Are you nerd enough to fully support Doom & Destiny Worlds and the dweebs who made it?

Doom & Destiny Ultimate Supporter Edition Bundle features:
- Doom & Destiny Worlds, the game, of course,
- the Season Pass, and never miss all the upcoming DLCs,
- the Deluxe Content.

name: Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker - Ultimate Edition
description:
The Ultimate Edition includes:
• NARUTO TO BORUTO: SHINOBI STRIKER (full game)
• Season Pass 1
• Season Pass 2
• Season Pass 3
• Season Pass 4

The Naruto franchise is back with a brand new experience in NARUTO TO BORUTO: SHINOBI STRIKER! This new game lets gamers battle as a team of 4 to compete against other teams online! Graphically, SHINOBI STRIKER is also built from the ground up in a completely new graphic style. Lead your team and fight online to see who the best ninjas are!

name: Fatum Betula + Moto Rush GT
description:
Unleash the thrill of discovery and speed with our must-have gaming bundle: Moto Rush GT + Fatum Betula!

• Dive into the enigmatic world of Fatum Betula, an atmospheric exploration game that transports you to a reality without a past. Nurture a mystical birch that shapes the future, decipher light puzzle elements, and strive to achieve one of the 10 unique endings.

• Hit the road with Moto Rush GT, the high-octane motorbike racing experience. Select from a plethora of customizable motorbikes and race your way through over 100 levels of adrenaline-fueled excitement. The road rules are yours to break in this exhilarating mix of endless and arcade racing.

Don't miss out on this dynamic duo of mystique and action. Get the bundle now and supercharge your gaming adventure!

name: Bongus Bright-Eye & The Great Axe-Stravaganza
description: Bongus Bright-Eye & The Great Axe-stravaganza is an homage to the classic Point & Click Adventure games. It's a comedy induced fantasy game, where you follow our protagonist Bongus Bright-Eye on his journey to save the Dwarven Kingdom.

name: FireRun
description: "FireRun" offers a thrilling 2D adventure in an ordinary 3D world. Break through obstacles, survive, and showcase your sprinting skills. Prepare for heart-pounding challenges and unleash your courage in this exhilarating game!

name: Demon Dodger
description: Demon Dodger is an all-ages, heckin' good time! Navigate a rain of demons without falling to waste alongside them. Dodge the cons of a magical fairyland, and make sure not to be caught while lurking amid the remnants of an experimental disaster.

name: FPV Logic
description: FPV Logic is an FPV drone simulator with near-real physics and operation experience. Whether you enjoy freestyle or racing, you can find the same fun as flying a real drone in this game.

name: Hermes: The Fury of Megaera
description: An ancient rivalry resurfaces. Megaera, a vengeful being with a dark past, found solace in her ominous lair, surrounded by suffering and horror. Fuelled by resentment and a thirst for power, she set her sights on Aphrodite, the embodiment of beauty.

name: Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker - Master Character Training Pack: Obito Uchiha (Ten Tails)
description: A special training pack for your avatar! Get Obito Uchiha (Ten Tails) as a master in this Master Character Training Pack!

name: Hentai World: Premium Edition
description: Feast your eyes with Akane, Rose, and Nanami in the most sensual puzzle game experience Nintendo Switch has to offer.

name: Little Harvest
description: Plant, water, and harvest your crops. Expand your land and buy new crops and items!

name: Knights & Guns: Silver Edition
description:
Knights & Guns: Silver Edition is a digital bundle that contains the base game and Armor Pack #2 which adds 2 majestic armors, epitomizing grandeur and strength.

A classic revenge story set in a medieval fantasy world… with a touch of deadly modern firepower just to turn things up to eleven. Fight through the armies of undead, mutants, aliens, machines and beasts in order to get back what is rightfully yours and bring some semblance of peace back to the land. Who knows - if you’re thorough enough you might even discover the history of the kingdom itself, long lost to the scholars of the realm.

name: Moto Rush GT: Silver Edition
description: Ultimate motorbike racing experience for all ages!

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Airport Milano Malpensa
description: The Brughiera plains to the north-west of Milano rank as the cradle of Italian aircraft construction. Today, Milano-Malpensa is one of merely a few airports left in this historic region. Malpensa is the second largest airport in Italy and serves as a hub for Alitalia, the largest Italian airline.

name: Sinister Games
description: “Sinister Games is a social deduction game with 8 players, 2 infiltrators, and a "Core" in an asylum. Use rewards to buy items from the vending machine for protection. Find the infiltrators, vote out the King to win. Infiltrators assassinate players, if all players are assassinated, they win.”

name: Pizza Bar Tycoon: Co-op Edition
description: Become the pizza magnate! Create the best pizza in town!

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Gold Edition
description:
Game includes:
15+ Stages
30+ Weapons

name: Archers Dream
description: Welcome to the addictive world of archery! Immerse yourself in an epic video game adventure that will take you from one region to the next and challenge you through 30 exciting levels. Explore three breathtaking regions, each with its own unique atmosphere and challenges. Journey through majestic forests, steep mountain peaks, and a mysterious desert. Each region offers a rich visual experience and unique landscapes that will delight your senses.

name: Adorabilis
description: "Adorabilis" is a game where you control a white ghost to protect adorabilis from various threats while sending it home. You'll have to dodge enemies and trap, or using skills to get through difficulties on the way to home.

name: Phanotia: Interlude I-Aubzan Abbey
description: Princess Biana of the Fraensius Empire decided to send her trusted courtiers Celine and Allea, as well as Connecticut, as foreign aid to rescue the Vampir prostitutes who were secretly imprisoned in the Aubzan Abbey and played for the nobles, And try to find a larger dark network behind it.

name: Zombie Town!
description: A fun quick-play game for all. You play as the game's hero, protecting your local neighbourhood from the zombie invasion.

name: Amalgamy
description: Blend into the crowd, track down your friends and win the game.

name: Impossible Stunts
description: Prepare for an adrenaline-pumping experience in this racing game of Impossible Stunts!

name: Backdoors
description: Enter the twisted realm of the Backrooms. Explore 100 procedurally generated rooms, and survive with up to three friends in intense co-op action. Unravel the secrets, beware of lurking entities. Find the way out or become lost forever in the depths of the Backrooms.

name: Fatpets
description:
Navigate adorable animals to their goals in Fatpets!
Solve engaging, physics-based puzzles with the strategic use of bubbles.
Easy to pick up, satisfying to master.

name: Phantom of Zana
description: Swing, dash, slide and slice your way through this retro style 2D side scrolling platformer! Blast, hack and slash your opponents or bounce off their heads! Power up Fantastic Fania to finally confront the Phantom of Zana!

name: Aquarium Designer: Amazonia
description: In Aquarium Designer: Amazonia DLC, you could create new or redecorate existing aquariums with new exotic items straight from one of the longest rivers, Amazon! Admire fish native to this region and watch them get along with the others!

name: Keep the Lights On
description: Keep the Lights On is an atmospheric horror game where you step in the shoes of Edmund Rosental, a private detective, who is tasked with investigating an old abbey and the mystery surrounding it. Will he be able to keep the lights on or will he succumb to the darkness

name: Imaginary Girl: Prequel
description: The future art will be drawn by two people... Platonic love? Drawing? Adventure game?

name: Vaudeville
description:
Vaudeville is a detective game in which the player plays the role of Detective Martini, a private detective who has come to the city of Vaudeville to solve the mystery of the murders of three people.

Vaudeville is an experimental whodunit game based on the latest AI technologies.
A tale of murder, suspense and absurdity that unfolds as you play, and you are the protagonist.

name: Bee-Man
description: Our Bee-Man's hives are scattered all over the place. Help it collect all of the hives in each level and travel to the next level in the bubble!

name: Breach
description: Challenge your friends or other players in the world in a dynamic duel based on melee weapons. Demonstrate liveliness and strategy to defeat your opponent. Impose your style of play and show others that you are the best.

name: Neonscape
description: Embrace Onyx, the master of the Black Lotus, in intense first-person hack n' slash combat. Maneuver compact battlegrounds, unleash spatial manipulation, and showcase unmatched agility. How long can you survive the relentless waves? Brace for an adrenaline-pumping test of mettle!

name: Everybody 1-2-Switch
description: Mix up your next get-together with the Everybody 1-2-Switch, the follow-up to 1-2 Switch. Grab some Joy-Cons or smart devices for team-based games that are easy to set up and feature everything from balloons to aliens, and more! People at your next party can get moving and show off their teamwork in this multiplayer mashup.

name: Doom & Destiny Worlds: Damsels & Dragons
description: Summon 3 playable heroines, sail to 9 uncharted islands, fight powerful horrors and craft epic gear in your final adventure!

name: Project CarnEvil
description: Project CarnEvil, the ultimate VR horror experience, invites you to confront your fears. This game will test you to your limits with difficult carnival games and a crazed clown to banish. Will you be able to overcome your fear and escape alive?

name: Franz
description: An experimental game that is hard to classify in terms of genre. In the game Franz we interact in various ways with the title character, which nestled on our device. The behavior of our charge changes, depending on the ways in which we communicate with her.

name: Zapling Bygone: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Zapling Bygone Deluxe Edition will include:
- Physical Game
- Original Soundtrack
- Zapling Pin
- Mini Cómics
- Collector's Box

name: Trash Bunny House
description: Trash Bunny House is a first-person exploration horror action game. You work as a writer on the edge working at a publishing company and you are heading towards an abandoned factory deep within the mountains. The abandoned factory was an old manufacturing site for animatronics meant for an amusement park. However, during manufacturing many unexplained fatal incidents occurred and it closed down. Then, after it was supposed to have been shut down, a tip-off came from someone who reported witnessing the animatronics often inside the factory. Take as many photos for the scoop as you can and come back alive.

name: Brick Exorcist
description: "Brick Exorcist" is a casual bishojo brick break game! You accidentally crossed into another world and became an exorcist. With the help of the goddess, you exorcised the beautiful girl who was possessed by the devil!

name: Labophobia
description: Labophobia is a 2D horror game where you play as a scientist trying to escape from a laboratory while avoiding a monster. Navigate through 50 rooms with unique mechanics to continue your escape. Face three bosses in a unique horror gaming experience.

name: Master Detective Archives: Rain Code - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Digital Deluxe Edition Contents:
- The game
- Digital Art Book
- Digital Soundtrack

name: Shame Legacy: The Cult Edition
description:
Shame Legacy is a first-person survival-horror, set in a forsaken cultist village. You attempt to survive using stealth and escape. By solving puzzles, you unravel the mystery that's h(a)unting you.

The Cult Edition includes special case and metallic-effect post card

name: Akka Arrh: Special Edition
description:
Special Edition Includes:

Butcher Bill’s Sticker Sheet
2x Arcade Cabinet Papercrafts

name: City Idle
description: Experience a city-building game, where the citizens are fully simulated and every decision you make impacts their lives. From the Stone Age to the Iron Age and beyond, watch your civilization evolve and progress under your guidance.

name: Brageskålen
description: Travel to Veøya in the Viking Age and solve a dangerous mystery with cunning and song!

name: RayStorm x RayCrisis HD Collection
description: Relive the excitement of lock-on laser shooting and epic sci-fi battles with two of TAITO’s most respected vertical shoot‘em ups – Both original arcade and HD versions!

name: Schachkampf
description: A fantasy chess game in a beautiful pixelart world. This is the game you always wanted on your SNES back in the days.

name: Magicube
description: A magical puzzle platformer made with PICO-8. Be thinky to get the legendary treasure.

name: Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective
description: "Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective" was created by Shu Takumi, the creator of the Ace Attorney series, and is now back in a long-requested HD remaster of the original 2010 release!

name: Penguin with a Pumpgun
description: Get ready for the zombie penguins! Penguin with a Pumpgun is a 2D retro-inspired roguelike set in a zombie infected hospital. Gun your way through 13 floors of horror and escape the hospital, while upgrading your character and weapon. Can you get to the ground floor to make your escape?

name: Nothing_Matters
description: A short narrative 'point and click' adventure inspired by the real life experience of a struggling solo indie game developer. A story about everything and hence nothing at all. Discover what truly matters to you.

name: Master Detective Archives: Rain Code - Mysteriful Limited Edition
description:
A brand new dark fantasy detective action game from the minds behind the Danganronpa series! Yuma, an amnesiac detective-in-training, and Shinigami, the spirit haunting him, tackle unsolved mysteries in a strange city caged by unending rain.

The Mysteriful Limited Edition contains:

The Book of Death: Art Book featuring commentary from Kazutaka Kodaka, Rui Komatsuzaki and Shimadoriru
Limited Edition exclusive Spirited 6.5″ Shinigami plush
Outerbox with exclusive art from Rui Komatsuzaki
Noise of Neon: Official Soundtrack composed by Masafumi Takada
Nintendo Switch SteelBook
Master Detective Archives: RAIN CODE physical game

name: Crime O'Clock
description: Crime O'Clock is an investigation and time exploration game with a deep storyline. Investigate cases through time and evolving maps by unveiling a multi-eras linked story. Will you be observant enough to solve the mysteries? Crime waits for no man!

name: RayCrisis HD
description: Remastered version of the arcade game that was first released within the 'RayStorm x RayCrisis HD Collection.'

name: Disharmony
description: A dialogue-heavy turn-based RPG featuring a rhythm-based battle system, a world inspired by music, and a retro aesthetic. Explore the dreams of the game's characters, solve puzzles, and find cryptic secrets to uncover the true nature of this mysterious world. (Or don't. Most of it is optional!)

name: Master Detective Archives: Rain Code
description: A brand new dark fantasy detective action game from the minds behind the Danganronpa series! Yuma, an amnesiac detective-in-training, and Shinigami, the spirit haunting him, tackle unsolved mysteries in a strange city caged by unending rain.

name: Desert Pirates
description: Lead a post-apocalyptic war convoy through the wasteland filled with ruthless foes, destroy them and take whatever you can to keep going. Fight, get resources and survive. How far can you ride?

name: Hexia
description:
Hexia is a turn-based strategy and management game, where your task, as the King of the Realm you have been assigned, is to create and expand the territory, build new infrastructures and command and lead your people. You will face events that will present themselves to you as opportunities for improvement or as unexpected circumstances to overcome, and your choices will be fundamental to allow your kingdom to have the success it deserves and thus obtain a place in the world.

The universe of Hexia is full of unexpected surprises and mysteries to be discovered. A deep and articulate story lurks behind every event, and every decision you make will have an impact on the continuation of the world’s plot, as well as the kingdom’s resources.
The game is constantly evolving, starting from the humility of a single tile, each game has the potential to create an empire that will stand the test of time!

name: Love Shore
description: Play as Sam or Farah as they attempt to navigate the neon thrills of their cyberpunk city Love Shore, solve murders, fight gods and maybe fall in love.

name: Cryptid Time
description: Sin descripción

name: Earth Defense Force 6: Additional Mission Pack 2 - Visions of Malice
description:
EDF6 Additional Mission Pack 2.
Includes 30+ unique missions and 5 difficulty levels + online co-op play.

name: Evernight
description: Sin descripción

name: Mencabrona
description: This Simulation puts you in the skin of a filthy supermarket stealer. It's a idle game made for Fuck Capitalism Jam 2023.

name: Castlevania: Galactic Panic
description: Sin descripción

name: Void Soul
description:
"Alright, we're going to rush to our target destination."

Endless revenge and twisted longing for family.
Steampunk fantasy of two emotions burning like fuse till the end begins now!

The story of an empire reigning over the desert continent and revel train confronting the empire.

name: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Gotopazu Story - Complete Set
description:
The Complete Set includes:
- The Game
- All 5 Illustration Art Books
- Gotopazu Story Soundtrack
- Complete Quintuplets Set Box

This set was exclusively sold at Maji-Get Stores.

name: Geometry Dash PSP
description: Unofficial port of Geometry Dash for the PSP.

name: SOVL: Fantasy Warfare
description: SOVL is a ruleset for playing fantasy wargames. It can be played with miniatures on a table or digitally on Steam.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Straying Stars
description:
Version 6.7 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Sugary Starburst
• New Story Chapter XXXVIII: Lone Tower, Fallen Star
• New Featured Event: ☆Perfect Performance☆
• ...and more!

name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals - Yandere Simulator
description: Yandere Simulator was the third crossover chapter for Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals.

name: Princesa das Nuvens
description: Princesa das Nuvens is a chaotic game where the player controls the knight tasked with protecting a princess. But she has a fragile heart, so while repairing damage to the tower done by enemies, you need to calm the princess down.

name: Lilith + Eve
description: Garden of Eden-inspired story about Adam who chases after angels, Eve who can't find her place in Elysium, and a lesser demon of the lilitu species — Lilith.

name: 9 R.I.P.: Special Edition
description:
"This city has long been a land of many being spirited away, and those who are mentally ill or heavily distressed are more likely to be taken. Are you alright?”

Protagonist Misa Isshiki is a second-year high school student. It was around the beginning of fall when her best friend said this to her, which gave her a shock.

“I don’t believe in being spirited away, so I’m alright.”

That’s right, she doesn’t believe in it. She just… feels lost because of a major distress—her career path.

She hears a creepy voice whisper in her ears.

“Let us find your path. I am the one who will tempt you into the darkness.”

From that point on, strange things begin to occur around her…

name: Tau
description:
A tubular shooter played entirely with the crank! Avoid obstacles and take fire at enemies while hurtling down a futuristic 360 degree road, turned with the crank.

Includes a 50 stage campaign to blast through, and a daily challenge mode. Chase your own high scores (and those of others!).

name: 2D Dogfight: Lord of Sky
description: "2D Dogfight - Lord of Sky" DLC includes 12 Aircrafts.

name: Striker Manager 3
description: Striker Manager 3 is the best Play to Earn multiplayer football manager game that combines the fun of traditional football games with the ability to be the owner of your in-game assets. Manager, your time has come!

name: Puppet Master: The Game - Curse of the Puppet Master Skin Pack
description:
You'll take part in Dr.Mcgrew's freakish experiments when you purchase the Curse of the Puppet Master skin pack for Puppet Master: The Game!

Includes skins and emotes based on the Sixth Puppet Master film, Curse of the Puppet Master.

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Season Pass
description:
The AEW: Fight Forever Season Pass includes access to even more AEW wrestlers and over-the-top minigames including:
- The AEW: Fight Forever FTR: Revival Pack
- The AEW: Fight Forever Limitless Bunny Bundle
- The AEW: Fight Forever Hookhausen Very Handsome, Very Evil Pack

name: I.Game Hong Kong Mahjong
description:
Looking for someone to play with? Join us for an exciting game of 13 Mahjong!

Now you can play Hong Kong Mahjong on Nintendo Switch, accompanied by authentic Cantonese voice, providing you with the most realistic gaming experience!

name: The Medium: Cloud Version
description: The Medium: Cloud Version arrives on Nintendo Switch, meaning Switch gamers can get in on a game that was said to only be viable via the latest technology.

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Chrono Circle + Music Diver Pack
description: A new pack featuring 10 songs, navigators, and avatars from "Chrono Circle" and "Music Diver"!

name: The Card Perfect Collection Plus: Texas Hold 'em, Solitaire and Others
description: An all-in-one collection for all your card game needs! Whether it's solitaire or competitive online games like Daifugo or Blackjack you're after, this is the game for you!

name: Arcade Archives: Cop 01
description:
"COP 01" is an action game released by Nichibutsu in 1985.
Players take control of rookie detective James with Police Precinct 1, infiltrate the secretive Specter organization's hidden base, and rescue their kidnapped partner Stacy as the goal.
Fight your way through the countless enemies in the hidden base using both your normal jump and the higher "Rocket Jump" performed using a limited gauge!

name: Pirates: The Legend of the Kraken
description: Can you defeat the fearsome Kraken? A fascinating game of choices where you are the key. Recruit your crew, track the Kraken and defeat it. The fate of the sea depends on you.

name: Offroad Truck 4x4 Dirt Simulator: Rally Racing Game
description: Gear up for the ultimate offroad experience in "Offroad Truck 4X4 Dirt Simulator: Rally Racing Game"! Embark on a thrilling adventure across two distinct locations, the scorching Desert and the untamed Woodland.

name: Into The Flames: Retro Truck Pack 1
description: Cruise to fire scenes in style! This pack includes 2 unique fire trucks inspired by some of America's most iconic trucks.

name: Everdream Valley: Summer Fun DLC
description: Set up your perfect outdoor gathering!

name: Trail Out: Legendary Cars
description: A collection of three iconic vehicles popularised through video games and movies.

name: Ravenbound: Hammers of Ávalt
