description: The Hammers of Ávalt DLC introduces the new hammer weapon archetype to Ravenbound. This pack adds hammer cards with unique stats and effects that you can collect and equip while exploring Ávalt, to help you on your journey towards defeating the Betrayer.

name: Shardpunk: Verminfall - Rat Pack
description: Leah, the Electromancer joins the Shardpunk roster and brings shock and awe to the ratty faces of her enemies. Her electrifying powers will come in handy during encounters with brand new enemy units - Stun Lancers and Elite variants of Shardpunk's vermin.

name: Magic Trap
description: Magic Trap is the best game in which your attentiveness and dexterity will be perfectly trained. Collect at least five crystals of the same color and attack the monsters. Don't forget to dodge pseudo crystals with spiky edges.

name: Bail or Jail: Character DLC Bundle 2
description: Sharlie, the feline shop clerk in-training, and Lulu, the chaos-loving poltergeist, are here! This DLC contains the following: • Sharlie • Coffin Lantern • Lulu

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Antarctica
description: Where penguins spend their winter holidays This DLC includes: - Roller coaster map: Antactica. - One roller coaster cart.

name: OMSI 2: Add-On - Man SL200
description: This add-on contains SL200 modification (VöV and StÜLB versions) equipped with naturally aspirated D2566MUH diesel engine and 3-speed automatic gearbox with retarder.

name: Home Designer Makeover Blast: Sheila's Little Girl's Room
description: Join Sheila in making over shy Lynda's room! Transform it into the world's comfiest study sanctuary that this little homebird deserves. Let's create a delightful haven for Lynda!

name: Home Designer Makeover Blast: Steve's Sky Loft
description: Step into Steve's high-flying life in this DLC. Transform his sky-high residence to reflect his success. Design an abode that screams power, glory, and Steve's unmatched heights.

name: Home Designer Makeover Blast: Sheila's Modern Kitchen
description: Step into the culinary world of Michelin Star pastry chef, Sheila, in this DLC. Help redesign her kitchen into a glamorous baking haven, making every creation a delightful experience.

name: Home Designer Makeover Blast: Mark & Mary's Master Bedroom
description: Dive into Mark & Mary's love story set in the Faroe Islands. In this DLC, guide the newlyweds through the makeover of their Master Bedroom, crafting a romantic refuge just for them.

name: Home Designer Makeover Blast: Liam & Beth's Studio Apartment
description: Assist lovebirds in designing their Studio Apartment through exciting blast puzzles. Each solution brings them closer to their cozy nest.

name: Home Designer Makeover Blast: Jason's Industrial Loft
description: Step into the life of Jason, a professional trader by day and a charismatic DJ by night. In this DLC, take on the challenge of transforming his empty loft into a serene sanctuary, striking a balance between style, comfort, and functionality.

name: Dungeon Defenders: Hermit Hero
description: The Hermit joins the heroes of Etheria! Harness the elements to take on the Old One's army!

name: Becoming Your Beautiful Cousin
description: Becoming Your Beautiful Cousin is a novel game in which the protagonist has a gender switch condition from his grandfather's invention, and gets involved in various troubles while trying to find a way back to his original body.

name: Math World VR
description: Math World VR combines fun games with simple math to exercise the brain! This STEM Accredited VR game consists of 12 fun mini-games for all ages to enjoy! Each mini game in Math World VR combines simple math that adds a fun challenge. Who said brain exercise can't be fun?

name: Stuck With Naughty Housewives
description: Three married women are lonely due to various reasons. So they set their sights on a introverted young man living in the same apartment...?

name: Chimera Island
description: Rediscover a lost island with mysterious creatures the world has long since forgotten. Now it is up to you to help restore this ruined world and bring about a new age of Chimera.

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - FTR: Revival Pack
description: Expand your AEW player roster with FTR, former AEW World Tag Team Champions, Dax Harwood and Cash Wheeler AND gain access to two brand new minigames: JoinUs and Deth Race-X

name: Spirit Island: Horizons of Spirit Island
description: Horizons of Spirit Island adds 5 new Spirits and 3 new island boards for even more variety.

name: Treasure Mountain
description: Collect a treasure, slay the dragon

name: Tiny Visitors
description: Tiny Visitors is a 3D Platformer, based on physics, mixing escape-game, search & find and mini-games. You can play up to 4 players in local coop.

name: World of Art: Learn with Jigsaw Puzzles - Pixel Art by Numbers
description: All Your favorite Paintings from "World of Art - learn with Jigsaw Puzzle" Collection! Choose Your favorite Pixel Art resolution, a number of colors in Your color palette and start painting!

name: Suicide Guy: The Lost Dreams
description: A whole new loony dream world to explore!

name: Galactic Catch
description: Great for all ages! Play the latest out-of-this-world fishing game from Baobab Studios, 9x Emmy-winning creators of the fan-favorite, "Invasion!"

name: Lost Connections
description: If she leaves now you will never see her again. Would you have enough courage to take a step, or would you stay quiet and regret it? Experience this story about love and loss.

name: Fun.Io
description: Battle for survival in FUN.IO! Choose your tank, face deadly bots, and reach the top of the leaderboard in a relentless arena. Customize your tank, unlock upgrades, and prove your skills in this roquelike action experience. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021: Dodge, Plymouth, Chrysler Remastered
description: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021 - Dodge | Plymouth | Chrysler Remastered includes 8 licensed cars from 3 manufacturers!

name: Bus Tycoon Night and Day
description: Start building your passenger bus transport empire between cities all night and day! Bus Tycoon Night and Day is a passenger transport tycoon game.

name: EIsland Hop
description: You are trapped in a bay surrounded by rocks. You must find and collect all the portal shards scattered across different islands to gain the chance to escape! Are you able to rebuild the portal in time, or will you stay trapped forever?

name: Displaced Defense
description: A turn-based, open world, class-based RPG. Explore the world and become stronger to get back home. Enjoy your time building your team to be the best they can be! Thank you for playing my first game release!

name: Miasma
description: Miasma is a first-person psychological horror maze game with a horrific atmosphere, you are trapped in a maze-like prison with a mysterious creature, and your only hope of survival is to find a way to escape.

name: MagicShop2
description: An 18+ game that features a unique combat system mixed with adult activity that is never before seen in any other game.

name: Re-Loaded
description: Introducing the roll call of shame as Mamma, Bounca, Butch, Cap'n Hands, Sister Magpie and The Consumer blast their way through six huge blood soaked worlds to inflict brutal revenge on the supremely evil C.H.E.B.

name: The Lara Croft Collection
description: Lara Croft makes her Nintendo Switch debut with two Tomb Raider adventures in one treasure-packed bundle, featuring non-stop arcade combat and 2-4 player co-op.

name: Hell Trigger
description: You are Unit ***, a soldier who was tasked to do a yearly expedition to The Flesh. Your Mission: Find and gather data about The Heart of The Flesh, and why it is eating up all of humanity. Can you reach The Heart in this brutal horror inspired rouge like?

name: Pongspin
description: A surreal, experimental take on Pong challenging you to protect a circular "core" using an orbiting paddle to deflect the ball.

name: Medieval Royal Chess: Classic Board Game
description: Chess is a very old and very popular board game for logic and mind in the style of the Middle Ages!

name: Mindset
description: Take on an intellectual challenge and use your wits to solve dozens of intriguing cube-shaped puzzles while unraveling the mystery of your past.

name: Dead Hook
description: Dead Hook is an explosive mix of roguelike and shooter genre with brutal combat and captivating storytelling. Explore the elder planet Resaract and take on the role of Adam Stone, a mercenary, smuggler, thief, and devoted husband.

name: Cuboy
description: Cuboy is a minimalist platform game.

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Elite Edition
description:
The AEW: Fight Forever Elite Edition includes access to even more AEW wrestlers and over-the-top minigames including:

- The AEW: Fight Forever FTR: Revival Pack which features AEW wrestlers Dax Harwood and Cash Wheeler PLUS minigames JoinUs and Deth Race-X
- The AEW: Fight Forever Limitless Bunny Bundle which features AEW wrestlers The Bunny and Keith Lee PLUS minigames MJF Car Thrash and Sloth Sling
- The AEW: Fight Forever Hookhausen Very Handsome, Very Evil Pack which features AEW wrestlers HOOK and Danhausen

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Matt Hardy
description: Play as two of the many Matt Hardys: Matt Hardy and Broken Matt Hardy. Pre-order Bonus for AEW Fight Forever!

name: Grisaia Phantom Trigger 5.5 to 08
description:
Grisaia Phantom Trigger is finally complete!
The second half of the series is now available in one package!

name: Little Cities: Sandbox Update
description: An upcoming update for Little Cities.

name: Moving Blocks Puzzle
description: More than 150 puzzles await you to be solved! Slide the pieces around the empty box until you form the target figure. The figures to be formed are "identicons", which are pixel like figures formed from encoded words.

name: Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty - Battle of Zhongyuan
description: The first DLC for Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty. It includes new stages, difficulty levels, weapon types, enemies and more, promising an exciting experience for Wo Long experts and novices alike.

name: PowerWash Simulator: SpongeBob SquarePants Special Pack
description: Let the nautical nostalgia wash over you as you soak up the sights of bikini bottom and get totally absorbed in a mini campaign spanning across six new maps, featuring: Conch Street, The Bikini Bottom Bus, The Krusty Krab; The Patty Wagon; The Invisible Boatmobile and The Mermalair.

name: Infinite Dungeon Crawler: The Swampy Isles
description: DLC adds an additional world to travel to when you go through the Gate. Prepare yourself for a lush jungle and palm-lined beaches, filled with ancient ruins, sunken ships, and fierce monsters.

name: Idle Medieval Tavern
description: Once upon a time, in a realm of danger and intrigue, you find yourself entrusted with the management of a quaint medieval tavern. This captivating idle game weaves a tale of daring quests, legendary heroes, and a thriving tavern that serves as the heart of a bustling community.

name: Abathor: Atlantis Landing
description: Play Abathor Atlantis Landing and relive the glory of arcades in this action platformer for up to 4 players.

name: I'll Kill Her
description: Visual novel in the form of interactive comic book about love, life and fighting to be heard.

name: The Artist: Act One
description: Do you feel good where you are? Some people do, some don't even if they have everything in the world. Does love fix that sort of feeling, even if such feelings feel so hard to grasp and such love could be toxic to yourself? What is a loving muse to the artist who paints them?

name: 9 R.I.P.
description: An otome visual novel about being spirited away.

name: Xicatrice
description: Around 100 years since superpowers awakened in society, the Anti-Abnormal Unusual Talent Team (AUT) was created to prevent incidents caused by those wrongly using their powers. However, as these efforts became strained, the Reserve Anti-Unusual Talent Team (RAUT) was then formed to assist in tackling such conflict. This group is made up of the aforementioned students. Now, in 2023, the protagonist is a former member of the AUT who lost their powers after an unknown incident.

name: Vacuum Warrior
description: Vacuum Warrior is a Free to Play incremental idle game. Listen to the crisp crackle of dust and debris entering your vacuum as you vacuum ridiculous amounts of dust. Upgrade your vacuums, idle gains, and robot vacuums, earn achievements, and explore numerous locations in the Vacuum Warrior universe!

name: Qwerty Quest
description: Type your way to the top of the leaderboard as an epic Wordslayer! Perfect for anyone serious about improving their typing speed and accuracy in a fun, educational way.

name: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Gotopazu Story - Yotsuba Nakano Set
description:
The Yotsuba Nakano Set includes:
- The Game
- Illustration Art Book "Yotsuba Nakano "
- Gotopazu Story Soundtrack Included
- Yotsuba Nakano Set Box

name: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Gotopazu Story - Itsuki Nakano Set
description:
The Itsuki Nakano Set includes:
- The Game
- Illustration Art Book "Itsuki Nakano"
- Gotopazu Story Soundtrack Included
- Itsuki Nakano Set Box

name: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Gotopazu Story - Miku Nakano Set
description:
The Miku Nakano Set includes:
- The Game
- Illustration Art Book "Miku Nakano"
- Gotopazu Story Soundtrack Included
- Miku Nakano Set Box

name: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Gotopazu Story - Ichika Nakano Set
description:
The Ichika Nakano Set includes:
- The Game
- Illustration Art Book "Ichika Nakano"
- Gotopazu Story Soundtrack Included
- Ichika Nakano Set Box

name: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Gotopazu Story - Nino Nakano Set
description:
The Nino Nakano Set includes:
- The Game
- Illustration Art Book "Nino Nakano"
- Gotopazu Story Soundtrack Included
- Nino Nakano Set Box

name: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Gotopazu Story
description: Gotopazu, the October 27, 2020-released smartphone game based on The Quintessential Quintuplets, comes to consoles in the form of memorial stories. The console version is developed by MAGES., developers of The Quintessential Quintuplets ∬: Summer Memories Also Come in Five and The Quintessential Quintuplets the Movie: Five Memories of My Time with You. It features the first year’s worth of memorial stories from Gotopazu for all five quintuplets, fully voiced across 24 volumes. There are also over 500 illustrations. And the Illustration Book Set editions are a must-have item for diehard fans.

name: Ozymandias: Aegean Sea
description: Including a new map: Aegean Sea!

name: Vetrix Worlds
description: The critically acclaimed Tetris-inspired VR Puzzle game is back with a feature-packed sequel! Enjoy the game alone with our Arcade and Campaign modes, or get social with our all-new Co-op and Competitive Multiplayer Online modes. Time to scratch that OCD itch of yours!

name: Hexceed: Cogitare Pack
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Cogitage Puzzle your way through 110 new levels with a new mechanic!

name: Ketsugou Danshi: Elements with Emotions
description: Ketsugou Danshi: Elements with Emotions is a friendship bonding simulation adventure visual novel, where players will bond together with the Shikenkan, special boys that wield the elements of the periodic table, as the world comes to an end in 50 days.

name: Inner Ashes
description: Inner Ashes is a first person, narrative, puzzle adventure, where the player puts himself in Henry's shoes, a forest guard diagnosed with early-onset Alzheimer’s. He has to travel through his mind to discover why his only daughter Enid disappeared from his life.

name: Perfect Partner
description: Perfect Partner is a party game with 2 people work closely together to defeat other teams to win. The road to the championship is full of obstacles, your teammates may be your worst enemy! Have fun in this game or meet the soul mate you are most acquainted with here.

name: Enclave HD
description:
This classic returns to consoles for the first time in nearly a decade, and comes to PlayStation for the first time ever. Fight in dual campaign during the Great War of Celenheim in this enhanced and upgraded version of the beloved medieval action combat game.

Begin your campaign as a soldier of the Light, defending Celenheim from forces of darkness and the horrid demon king Vatar. Change sides and complete an alternative campaign as a minion of the dark tasked with infiltrating and destroying the Enclave you just sough to protect. Twelve different classes and multiple weapon options create great deployability as you descent dungeons, complete missions, and vanquish your enemies.

name: The Drift Challenge
description: Slide your ride in different game modes. Earn XP points and complete challenges to level up and unlock cars or drift with friends in the Online Multiplayer mode.

name: Blood Field
description: Explore a sinister world with environments based on Vietnam culture and a storyline inspired by Vietnam myths and folklore.

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever
description: AEW: Fight Forever combines nostalgic arcade-wrestling with All Elite Wrestling finishers and moves. Featuring a big roster of AEW talent, multiple match types, robust career mode, tons of customization options, more than 40 weapons, and so much more!

name: The Wandering Village
description: The Wandering Village is a city-building simulation game with survival and rogue-like elements. Build a village on the back of a giant, wandering creature, farm crops and forage resources to keep your villagers alive and form a symbiotic relationship with your giant host to survive together in a hostile, yet beautiful post-apocalyptic world.

name: Noob: The Factionless
description:
Noob RPG is a transmedia license on the subject of Massive
Multiplayer Online Role Playing Game (MMORPG). In this game, you will be able to go from the real world to the virtual world to try to reach level 100, then legendary.

name: Caught by a Spider
description:
You've fallen into the spider's web.

Caught by a Spider is a short yandere Visual Novel where you talk to a Spider!

name: Crimes of Passion II
description: Crimes of Passion, Book 2 is the second book of the Crimes of Passion series. It succeeds its first book, Crimes of Passion, Book 1 and is followed by Crimes of Passion, Book 3.

name: Soul Void Redux
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic [Unl]
description:
In 2010 an unknown rom was posted on the romhacking community of Sonic the Hedgehog. The rom in question was found near an abandoned nursery under broken condition. The rom was eventually dumped for all to play.

This rom became infamous for not having the greatest controls, and it appeared to be very glitchy. Some the glitches were that collision was off, and enemies spawned less frequently, it was removed on October 30th of 2010.

One user managed to grab it in time, and played the hack for themselves, and it wasn't just glitches that they saw.

name: Throwup Club
description: Throwup Club is an intricate choice-heavy psychological medicore thriller about an amnesiac facing both real and mental horrors within a world akin to an endless, liminal hospital. The game itself is an RCN (Roleplay & Click Novel) - a fusion genre of Visual Novel, RPG, and Point-&-Click games that centers around distressing content and how people choose to cope with trauma. Uncover the secrets of this strange world, and the ones lying within your own forgotten memories. Will you accept your limitations, or will you dive deep into delusion for a chance at hope?

name: Face 2 Face
description:
In a disturbing turn of events, Richter Farlane, renowned boss of the Japanese multi-media company Artemis, has been found dead. Now, the investigation rests on your shoulders! You'll have to question the various suspects, collect crucial clues and combine them skillfully! Mix two clues to create a delicious cocktail (and, incidentally, a new lead).

Face to Face is an investigative visual novel based on a system of combining clues to uncover new leads, and find the killer!

name: A Train Mystery
description: In the game, you play a detective tasked with solving the murder of a famous film critic. There are three suspects: the Actress, the Banker, and the Understudy. You must interrogate each of them, choosing your questions carefully, and at the end make your accusation.

name: Fire Emblem Fates: Shadow Dragon
description:
A Shadow Dragon Remake on the 3DS!
This is a remake of FE1/FE11 using Fire Emblem Fates as a base. This is fully completed and you can play start to finish. It has all 25 chapters from Shadow Dragon as well as the five Gaiden chapters from the DS remake (No you do not need to purge your army to access them).

name: Octopath Traveler II + Various Daylife Bundle
description: Octopath Traveler II + Various Daylife: two great games from Square Enix’s Team Asano in one bundle!

name: KKHTA: Security Watch
description: A KKHTA style I'm on observation duty game.

name: Perish: Exodus
description: Face the new challenges of Perish: Exodus a completely free content update that exists alongside the main campaign, on June 28th. Turn your back briefly on Elysium to explore the Winds of the Anemoi: four unexplored realms filled with terrific remixes and augmentations of existing weapons, fiendish enemies and boss fights that are even bigger and more devilish than those in the main campaign.

name: Eto King
description: An online tower defense game using Japanese zodiacs to fight.

name: The Settlements
description: A set of 3 maps with an emphasis on exploring surreal environments. Some bits may had challenging combat and traps. Mostly non linear progression. This mapset its a spiritual succesor to Liminal Doom aesthetics in some ways.

name: Cafe Master Story
description:
Have you ever wanted to run your own coffee shop?
The smell of fresh roast beans, the gurgling of the espresso machine, the sheen of a squeaky-clean counter... All this and more await you in this quirky sim game!
Just set up your tables and counter seats, and wait for the customers to come rolling in. Add handy features like magazine racks, or chic furnishings to give your cafe a more welcoming atmosphere.

name: Ednaldo Pereira: Mobile
description: Ednaldo Pereira: Mobile is a captivating platform game inspired by platforming classics that offers an engaging and challenging gaming experience. Explore different stages filled with obstacles, enemies, and treasures to unlock. Overcome thrilling challenges, collect golden notes, and improve your skills while enjoying vibrant graphics and an exciting soundtrack with remixes of Ednaldo's classics.

name: Beeps
description:
All of your babies have been kidnapped! You must solve difficult puzzles to rescue them all!

With more than 30 levels, create and share levels online!

name: Fortnite: Full Clip STW Pack
description: Homebase's surefire munitions maker finally gets to use her wares. Restock, reload and get ready with the Full Clip Pack.

name: The Battle of Polytopia: Skin Pack 3
description:
Skin pack 3 includes the following skins:
- Oumaji Khondor
- Kickoo Ragoo
- Zebasi Anzala

name: The Battle of Polytopia: Skin Pack 2
description:
Skin pack 2 includes the following skins:
- Imperius Lirepacci
- Xin-Xi Sha-po
- Luxidoor Aumux

name: The Battle of Polytopia: Skin Pack 1
description:
Tribe skins are basically costumes for the tribe that will change an entire tribe's aesthetic from the ground up! New clothes, new buildings, new music, and sometimes even new animals! The Skins are also visible in multiplayer mode and the AI opponents will also use the skins.

Skin pack 1 includes the following skins:
- Bardur Baergøff
- Hoodrick Yorthwober
- Vengir Cultist

name: Theatrhythm: Final Bar Line - Mana Pack
description: A pack of additional music tracks to use with Theatrhythm Final Bar Line.

name: Rocket Lift
description: Dodge the asteroids to fly further and score higher score then before.

name: Tasty Jigsaw: Happy Hour 3
description: What will you eat? We have fresh cakes and delicate ice cream, juicy burgers and hearty breakfasts, dinner parties and romantic dinners for you. No need to wash your hands before the game!

name: 100% Orange Juice: Waruda Prison Break Pack
description: This Extra Character Pack adds 2 new playable characters - the tough cookie Mimyuu (Jailbird) and her trusted partner, the somnolent Krilalaris (Pajamas) whose dark aura is sealed into her haunted dreams. The new characters come with announcer voices and have their own campaign!

name: Munchkin Digital: Unnatural Axe
description: Munchkin: Unnatural Axe shuffles up 112 new cards to help you kill monsters and take their stuff.

name: Tetrageddon Games
description: Tetrageddon is what the internet does to people. Bring the internet to your desktop with stunning 8-bit graphics, monkeys, and a mild lack of self respect that games can be proud of today.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Pack: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate - Fitness
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Bloomyth
description: Go on this journey, solve the puzzles and overcome the obstacles to discover the secret of the Bloomyth and save a life.

name: Dozle Corp. Map
description: Collaboration between Dozle & Spy Rumble! Let's play on the map with "Rocky-kun", a character invented by Ooharamen of Dozle Corp.!

name: Amairo Chocolate 2
description: Yunagicho, a town lined with Western-style homes. The previous autumn was when Yuzuki came to this town and met the animal eared girls and started working with them at Cafe Setaria.

name: Knights of Braveland: Fantastic Beasts
description: The Fantastic Beasts Expansion augments Knights of Braveland with a number of fearsome new bosses. In addition, you will now be able to play as a new hero, the mighty Wizard, who can defeat fantastic beasts with hunter's gear.

name: Neon Fantasy: Birds
description: Neon Fantasy: Birds is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Waking Atlas
description: Wake the great titan Atlas before he drops the world in this colorful and weird JRPG!

name: Court, Connect, Capture
description: Court, Connect, Capture is a short mystery and romance story in a fantasy setting that occurs differently with every play through. Make connections, romantic and deductive, in conversations allowing you to capture hearts... and spies!

name: Chameleon: DYH - Chapter 2
description:
Chapter Two of Chameleon - DYH continues Kai's journey to find his brother.
As Angie continues to investigate the infamous ''Silent Mourn'', Strom struggles to face his past.
Overwhelmed with feelings of sorrow and despair,
Strom remembers the fateful day when his eyes have changed.

name: Mobile Suit Gundam Extreme Vs. 2 OverBoost
description: Sin descripción

name: SlavicPunk: Oldtimer
description: The game is an isometric shooter. The story revolves around Yanus- a private investigator with a troubled past trying to solve the case of stolen data while fighting his inner demons, urban gangs and an omnipotent corporation responsible for the decay of the city he once used to call his own.

name: Spy Rumble
description:
The game is an identity concealment game in which players are divided into two camps, the agent camp and the spy camp, and must take action to achieve their respective victory conditions.
An enemy spy is mixed in with the agents called in by Operation C. The purpose of the spy is to sabotage the agents' activities and take them all out. The spy's objective is to disrupt the agents' activities and eliminate them all.

name: Dave the Diver
description: Dave the Diver is an action-adventure and management simulation game developed by Mintrocket. In the game, players control Dave, who spends his days diving into underwater environments to catch fish and gather resources, and his nights managing a sushi restaurant. The gameplay combines real-time underwater exploration and combat with restaurant management mechanics.

name: Soul Shifter
description: In Soul Shifter, the player breaks through the ruins of what was once the most glorious of the castles and discovers the secrets behind the magical elemental energy that brought prosperity but also disgrace to the kingdom.

name: A Long Journey to an Uncertain End
description: A Long Journey to an Uncertain End is a narrative management space opera where you recruit eclectic crew members, explore the known - and unknown - galaxy, make choices to drive your journey, and escape the clutches of your abusive ex.

name: Pekoe
description: Blend tea and friendship in the flavorful world of Pekoe, a cozy cat-filled tea-making simulator about taking the time for self-care and connecting with what makes you happy. Build relationships, upgrade your teahouse, and discover new recipes as you work towards creating a place you can call home.

name: FIFA Women’s World Cup 2023
description: Experience the FIFA Women’s World Cup in a variety of ways in FIFA 23. Step onto the pitch and lead your country as a soccer star with your own custom player. You can also compete in the tournament in Solo Tournament Mode or Kick-Off Mode.

name: A Romantic Murder
description:
You play as Mae (or the name of your choice), a detective pried out of London to investigate the suspicious death of one Henry Graves.

But when you arrive at the dead man's country manor, things aren't quite as you expected. Your clients don't take you seriously, the staff is behaving suspiciously, and the will reading is one step from becoming a brawl.

On the bright side, there's no shortage of handsome men about the place.

Less cheerfully, some of them may shortly become murderers. Or corpses.

name: Oni No Kenkyuushitsu
description: Oni No Kenkyuushitsu ("Laboratory Of The Oni") is a sequel to Oni No Yakata, set 10 years in the future, in the year 2028. You once more play as Ayana Hasegawa as she enters a new job as an intern at Crovich Research Facility, hoping to find a solution to the existence of the Oni that cost her the life of one of her friends, and the lives of many others before them. Little does she know, a combination of poor containment procedures and upper management with ulterior motives will cause the facility to unexpectedly release its specimens and cause chaos.

name: Dark Space
description: this small game was made from the idea of 3 friends for a school project, the game is a boss battle that starts when you reach 100 points, in it you are the last hope of protecting the planet from an alien invasion, so be careful !

name: Pixel Paint 2: Ocean
description: Sin descripción

name: Story of Seasons: A Wonderful Life - Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Duskbound
description:
Made for Otome Jam 2023.

Gothic horror otome with a yandere vampire LI.

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Happy Edition
description: Coloring books are a great way to spend your time. It is a good way to settle the nerves and relax! It also develops your brain... just like eating fish. Use one of the premade templates or create your own illustrations.

name: Daymare Cat: 10-year Anniversary
description:
Daymare Cat is a gorgeously sketched exploratory platformer that feels like a simple adventure game.

Things that are new in this Anniversary Edition:

– The game is in glorious 60 fps and plays in full screen.
– Most noticeably the game has new background texture. This might be a bit controversial take, but in my opinion this improves the vibe.
– Interactive items have a color. Yes. A color.
– Cat now runs like a ballerina, not a raptor. Thank god.
– Platforming is a bit easier thanks to hitbox tweaking but also by redrawing platforms in few places, for reference check the main gate.
– I added a new pathway for you in case you have a fear of being eaten alive by a cosmic horror monster and really don’t want to do this part. So now you can go around it.
– No changes were done to the music, since it’s already perfection.

name: Down the Eye of the Tiger
description: A burnt out Las Vegas cocktail waitress has grown to resent her life, her city, and her choices. In the wake of an incident at her job, she decides to dedicate some more time to "self care" (sleeping, adopting avoidant behaviors, ditching work), and finds her dreams blending with those of the magician's white tiger at the casino where she works.

name: The Curious Case of Captain Cray
description:
After the disastrous wreckage of his ship Captain Cray finds himself and his crew upon a curious island of dreams, where his crewmates are found in deep slumber. There, he realizes he can miraculously enter their dreams by resting himself...

Will Captain Cray be able to rescue his crew? Or will they forever be succumbed to their nightmares?

name: Swan Song
description: Swan Song is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 7 by scummbag.

name: Flushed Regrets
description:
Explore a surreal world full of toilets, bathrooms and excrement!

Will you ever understand?...

What happened is in front of you, can you understand what you are being shown and realise the true ending of this game?

name: MiMiMi
description:
MiMiMi is a short Yume Nikki fangame made during the Dream Diary Jam 7.
You play as Maya, a girl who lives in a house in the middle of nowhere with her cat and also her weird talking computer called Emily.
There is not much to do because the world ended, so your only option is to go to sleep and explore your dream world!!!

name: Pixel Paint 2: Deluxe Edition
description: Pixel Paint 2 is a sequel to an extremely popular game by the same name. The rules are quite simple. Put your mind at ease, follow the numbers, and fill out every last pixel with the right color.

name: 15 Minutes Dungeon
description: Can you beat the dungeon in 15 minutes? Roguelike + RTA.

name: AntiBots
description: AntiBots is an online PvP arena party game for 2-4 players where you and your friends must run, shoot and grapple to victory, all while anti-gravity switches on and off.

name: Sun Haven: Set Sail Pack
description: This Set Sail Pack includes a Pirate Furniture Set, 2 Pirate-themed Mounts, 3 Pirate-themed Pets, and 8 Pirate-themed outfits.

name: Sun Haven: Ocean Shores Pack
description: This Ocean Shores Pack includes a Mermaid Furniture Set, 1 Ocean-themed Mount, and 7 Beach themed outfits!

name: Sun Haven: Mushy Pack
description: This Mushy Pack includes a Mushroom Furniture Set, 1 Mushroom-themed Mount, 1 Mushroom-Themed Pet, and 15 Mushroom-themed outfits.

name: Train Sim World 3: Glossop Line - Manchester: Hadfield & Glossop Route
description: Climb aboard the Northern Class 323 “Hyper Networker” and embark on a journey in Northwest England. Magnificent Mancunian scenery comes to life along the quaint Glossop Line: Manchester - Hadfield & Glossop in Train Sim World 3!

name: Worlds Align: Beginning - Collector's Edition
description: The game worlds are in danger, and some of your favorite characters have come together to ask an outsider for help. That's where you come in! Will you answer their call?

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Sky Nomads Campaign
description: Sky Nomads continues the story of the Soviet fighter pilot you may know from the Blazing Steppe campaign.

name: Miners Settlement
description: Explore enchanting landscapes with unique pixel art graphics. Join a guild for thrilling adventures and epic battles. Cooperate to conquer dungeons and dragons. Trade in the Open Market, master professions, and create your build. Forge friendships and shape your destiny in our immersive RPG world!

name: Prince or Villain
description: A slice of life BL about a patissier who loves to bake. Kai feels left out when Percy and Gavin grow closer with one another. One day, Lance appears into Kai's life with a plan to have him all to himself. Will Kai stay with Percy and Gavin, or will he choose Lance?

name: Meet Your Maker: Sector 1 Arsenal Pack
description: Meet Your Maker's Sector 1 Arsenal Pack expands your toolbox with 4 vicious implements of death including a new trap, guard, Custodian, and weapon. Master these lethal additions and make sure no Raider survives your next creation.

name: Meet Your Maker: Sector 1 Cosmetic Collection
description: Meet Your Maker's Sector 1 Cosmetic Collection invites you to delve deeper into the Dreadshore. Let your twisted creativity flow with cosmetics inspired by the infamous New England Sanctuary and the lone prisoner that escaped its sinister experiments.

name: The Password Game
description:
Please choose a password

Absurdist puzzle game wherein the password requirements become ever more complex.

name: JR EAST Train Simulator: Keiyo Line (Soga to Tokyo) E233-5000 Series
description: The Keiyo Line, which opened in 1990, is a relatively young line within JR East, connecting Chiyoda-ku, Tokyo, with Chiba City, Chiba Prefecture. Except for the underground section between Tokyo Station and Etchujima Station, the entire line is characterized by running on elevated tracks along Tokyo Bay.

name: Sex Story: Ruby and Hunter - Episode 3
description: The story continues with Ruby's perspective, as she wakes up in Hunter's bed after their wild night to some expensive gifts. She plans a special thank-you to reward Hunter's gesture, but it takes a hell of a turn when she catches his naughty Maid playing with her pussy while she is spying on her.

name: The Callisto Protocol: Final Transmission
description: Dig deeper into the horrifying secrets of The Callisto Protocol.

name: Ikuzo
description: made to feel like a true sword fight, where the enemy and the player are on the same starting line, both sides use the same mechanics, no hard bullies, no high values, So it's a very simple action game, there's a combo system, there's a roguelike, there's a little bit of a growth system.

name: Panel Rabbit
description: Flash! Puzzle Action！ Place the panels on the ground and Guide the rabbit safely to the goal!

name: Construction Simulator: Airfield Expansion
description: With the Construction Simulator: Airfield Expansion, fans of heavy construction machines can look forward to the most extensive expansion for Construction Simulator to date. The DLC opens up access to a new construction campaign on each of the game's two maps, so you will get the exciting opportunity to build a new airfield for the respective region. Within these huge campaigns, it’s not only a matter of preparing, levelling and asphalting the runways - of course, the control towers, terminals and hangars have to be built too!

name: Dimensional Dexterity
description: Immerse yourself in the innovative gameplay, where the central mechanic revolves around the seamless shifting of Dimensions. With each shift, the world around you transforms, presenting new obstacles to overcome and hidden paths to discover.

name: The Lost Adventure
description: The Lost Adventure - is a straightforward 2D game in which the main hero must escape from a dungeon and recover lost memories. You will encounter battles against bloodthirsty slimes, cunning goblins, and numerous other dangers that await you.

name: Unmatched: Digital Edition - Jekyll & Hyde
description:
Jekyll & Hyde uses the former's cunning and the latter's brute strength to win the day!
Get them to join you in Unmatched today! This DLC unlocks Jekyll & Hyde - a playable character for Unmatched: Digital Edition!

name: A Little to the Left: Cupboards & Drawers
description: Sort, stack, and organize household objects into particular arrangements in A Little to the Left: Cupboards & Drawers. Prepare to clean out the cabinets and secret compartments of the home with even more charming illustrations, surprising scenarios, and 25 delightful new Cupboards & Drawers themed puzzles to discover.

name: Garden of Roses: Summerset
description: A branching visual novel set in a world where monster girls walk among us. Take the role of Will Getz, a young man with a score to settle after 15 long years of being away from home. Unravel the mysteries and intrigue that have been awaiting your return, after all this time.

name: TimeK
description: This game is a side-scrolling puzzle action game where the player controls time to navigate through obstacles and enemies while collecting items and reaching the goal.

name: Little Friends: Puppy Island
description: Get ready for a pawsome puppy adventure in Little Friends: Puppy Island! Discover exciting locations, dig up hidden treasures, build and expand your holiday resort, and meet plenty of lovable little friends to care for on your very own un-paw-gettable, tropical island adventure!

name: Choo Choo Survivor
description: Drive your train and get to safety while shooting down endless hordes of zombies that are blocking your way. Upgrade your weapons and abilities and become absurdly powerful!

name: Sludge Life 2
description: Big Mud is missing! Everyone's favourite rapping frog has vanished, and his closest homie Ghost (that's you) is on a mission to find him. Sludge Life 2 whisks you away to Ciggy City Suites, a luxurious multi-floor hotel heaving with secrets, gadgets, gags, peculiar characters, and ugly corporate architecture to make over with your spray can.

name: Charade Maniacs: Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Gladiator's Arena
description: Gladiator's Arena is a top-down arena shooter rogue-lite where you play as a gladiator wielding up to 7 different medieval weapons to fight off hordes of enemies. Choose from a variety of upgrades and abilities to create unique builds.

name: Merchant of the Six Kingdoms
description: Become a medieval merchant and master the arts of bartering, haggling, and investing, Explore 20 markets, barter with 200 characters, and trade in over 1,800 items in a dynamic bartering and haggling system that will challenge and reward.

name: Front Mission: 1st Remake - Limited Edition
description:
The Front Mission 1st Limited Edition includes:
- The base game
- 2 lithographs
- An exclusive lenticular box
- A printed game manual

name: Bombing!! 2: A Graffiti Paradise
description: Bombing!! 2: A Graffiti Paradise is a creative sandbox painting game where the entire game world can be painted, and a sequel to Bombing!!: A Graffiti Sandbox. In the game the player explores hidden secrets, talks to characters, and unlocks painting tools to paint all over the world. It features a bright and vibrant art style with bold colours and graphics.

name: Yomi 2
description: A fighting game in card form. Learn your character, practice combos, and read the opponent's tendencies. Strategic, turn-based card battling that lets you experience the nuances of fighting games like Street Fighter and Fantasy Strike by a lead designer who worked on both.

name: Story of Seasons: A Wonderful Life - Limited Edition
description: Put down roots on your new farm in the peaceful town of Forgotten Valley, and tell your own generation-spanning tale in Story of Seasons: A Wonderful Life. Bring life to the land, find love among the town's friendly folk, and make lasting memories with a family of your very own in this reimagining of a beloved farm sim.

name: Salty Hounds
description: Enjoy a life full of romance in an open-world metropolis. Manage a security agency and romance its handsome bodyguards!

name: World Boss
description: A new FPS from Fresh and LazarBeam. Take on 15 other players in fast-paced arena combat. Level up to unlock upgradeable weapons and perks. Customise your Gladiator with unique builds for every playstyle. Delete your enemies. Climb the leaderboard. Take on the world.

name: OMSI 2: C2-Stadtbus-Familie Vol.1
description: The new C2 city bus family is a vehicle add-on created by OMSI 2 fans for OMSI 2 fans. A total of 7 different versions of the popular C2 bus are waiting to be used in the OMSI 2 bus simulator.

name: Spiritle
description: Spiritle is a turn-based strategic battle digital board game. You incarnate a Spirit among the 4 elements: Nature, Earth, Water and Fire. At the rhythm of the 4 seasons, the fallen Spirits challenge each other to regain their place in the World Tree.

name: Harry Potter: Magic Awakened
description: Harry Potter: Magic Awakened is a new collectible card mobile game with RPG elements. Collect magic cards and experience exciting wizard battles! A mysterious magical journey is about to begin!

name: Inkesis
description: Help Ink, our hero, fight the evil that consumes the forgotten Library of Arga. Collect Knowledge and control your environment to explore this grandiose building, uncover secrets, and forge your own path in this adventure and puzzle game! But beware, your greed could lead you astray...

name: Crystal Survivor
description: Defeat your enemies with super powerful charged shots! "Crystal Survivor" is a top-down roguelite arena shooter. Use the crystal's unique attack methods, various weapons, items, and relics to survive.

name: Strawberry's Flowers
description: Sin descripción

name: Connections
description: Connections is a daily game about finding common threads between words. Players must select four groups of four words without making more than four mistakes.

name: Corruption Catharsis: Try To Act Normal
description: The ranger has been called to Ranger Station Theta as a precaution as scientists there have reported an anomaly with their slip-tech that would indicate a malevolant force has been trying to exploit the station. They could get a handle on the slip gate interdimensional array and use it as a back-door that would allow them to take control of some of Earth's remote facilities. Your breifing was to investigate the disturbance and eradicate any compromised forces or opposition that you encounter.

name: Forza Horizion 5: Barbie The Movie Car Pack
description: This Barbie is a gamer! Together with Warner Bros. Pictures and Mattel, Xbox is excited to invite fans on a fun, fashionable, and inspirational ride this summer to celebrate the much-anticipated release of the new movie “Barbie,” premiering in theaters on July 21. Bringing Barbie’s signature flair to our gaming platform, we’re honoring all that there is to love about this iconic role model: her persevering optimism, wide-ranging career journey and never-ending capacity for self-discovery. Audiences of “Barbie” will follow the heroine to the furthest reaches of Barbie Land and beyond, and now fans can follow in her high-heeled footsteps with exclusive Forza Horizon 5 in-game content

name: Moving
description:
Your name is Jay, you've had a long day, and now it's time to move.

In this WAD, you clear out an apartment while listening to somebody on the phone.
Your only task is to move objects. There is no horror element, no secret ARG, you can't even die or fail.
It's a short, relaxing experience throughout. Takes 15-20 minutes to complete.

Features excellent voice acting, custom music, and quite possibly the cutest Doomcute that you've ever seen.
Closed captions are also included, so you can play the game without sound if needed (though sound is recommended).

Inspired by the house cleaning section from "The Beginner's Guide", as well as games like "What Remains of Edith Finch" and "Gone Home". If you're a fan of Walking Simulators, you'll feel right at home. If not, there's probably little to win you over. ﻿

name: That's a Cow: Complete Edition
description:
With this bundle, you get three new headgear - a banana, an eggshell, and a crown.

Key Features:

- more than 20 cows to collect
- more than 100 levels
- shooting a stream of milk and more
- cute graphics in pastel colors
- rhythmic soundtrack in hip-hop and funky disco style

name: Aquarium
description: Yume Nikki fangame featuring a stone statue named Paint. An entry for Dream Diary Jam 7.

name: Openlid
description: A interpretation of Yume Nikki in 3D, developed for the Dream Diary Jam 7.

name: Rekuiemu Nikki
description:
Find me, otherwise you will lose yourself.

Rekuiemu Nikki is a Yume Nikki fangame, about exploring mind of young Julie, who locked herself at home due to adverse circumstances.

It took quite a long time, and Julie even forgot about the incident, but in one of her many dreams she discovered a strange creature. Now she is forced to find out the truth, but what it will lead to depends on the player.

name: Everlong Swansong
description:
Everlong Swansong is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 7. You play as Ana and explore her dreams.

What will you discover?

name: Pa-nap
description: A little Yume Nikki-inspired fan game made in 7 days for the Dream Diary Jam 7.

name: StoryMode.Online
description:
A Hilarious Multiplayer Collaborative Storytelling Adventure!

Step into the roles of both writers and choosers to shape the narrative in each round. As a writer, you'll submit your most ingenious phrases, hoping to impress the chooser. If your phrase is chosen, you earn a point and it becomes an integral part of the evolving story. The power to select the winning phrase lies in the hands of the chooser, so choose wisely and watch the tale unfold!

The journey continues until a writer reaches the score limit, emerging as the victorious storyteller. Let your creativity soar and outshine your opponents to claim this prestigious title!

name: Teeny Tiny Town
description:
Welcome to Teeny Tiny Town, where you can indulge your inner city planer and craft your very own bustling city! Merge, build, and watch your town flourish before your eyes.

In this captivating puzzle game, your objective is to combine three or more items on the board to construct new structures. Start with humble trees and transform them into majestic houses, and then merge those houses to create even grander residences! Unleash your creativity and witness your town grow exponentially.
As your city thrives, collect gold from your houses to unlock and acquire new items, expanding your options for development. Strategically manage your resources to maximize your town's potential.

name: Switch Sides 2: Sea Sandwich
description: The mercat is hungry! Guide him by switching sides to feed him those lovely sandwiches!

name: Etcetera
description: Etcetera is a Yume Nikki fangame. You are "Innard". You must return a lost pistol to "Etcetera". You need to find him.

name: Jephs Furry Adventures 7
description: An unique adult game which combines interesting logic puzzle with exciting animations of furry girls that you earn after successfully passed levels!
